Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This was my first time using the Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil and I must admit that after initially opening up the package I was a bit overwhelmed. The scent was so strong that I can smell it through the bottle and I just knew in my heart that this would be a disappointment. But I still wanted to try it out and to my surprise I actually ended up enjoying the Lavender Essential Oil. I struggle with falling asleep in a timely fashion so I used a cotton ball and just dabbed a drop or two on the back of my pillow and the aroma really did help sooth and relax me. Now I will say this, a major key will be to only use a little. The saying a little goes a long way applies really well with use of this product because over using can come off too strong. I also appreciate the fact that it is kid safe when diluted with water if you have a household with little ones. I am looking into purchasing a Plant Therapy Essential Oil Diffuser to see if or how I would be able to incorporate the essential oils into my nightly routines. I would totally recommend this product.

review: I use lavender for sooooo many things but particularly for diffusing to help me sleep and as a spray to ward off mosquitos. I live in central Florida and the mosquitos come at you in swarms. I have tried many other natural deterrents but lavender is the best! Mosquitos just stay away!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I absolutely love lavender essential oil! It is one of my favorites! I use it in my diffusers, and put it on topically. This oil is amazing! I have actually reduced skin tags to almost nothing! I'm confident that with continued use I will be able to completely eliminate the skin tags! Besides that, it is very soothing! I will never be without this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I couldn't believe the price difference of this lavender compared to other companies. We love using this for burns or bug bites as well as making our own lotion bar sleepy sticks. Such a great value to use for body products!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)

Although I read some aromatherapists said lavender and tea tree are the only 2 oil we can directly apply on skin, I still feel a little bit too strong when doing so. So, I'd recommend to still dilute with our skin care product/ carrier oil and apply topically

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I ordered a bunch of the roll-on bottles as a prize for competing in a company stress reduction challenge. The employees love them! it's wonderful that they're pre-diluted so that people who are new to essential oils can safely be introduced and enjoy the benefits of aromatherapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the most pleasant smelling lavender I've ever used. I use lavender on a daily basis in my body butters, lotion bars, and lip balm. I diffuse it every night at bedtime and apply it to my hands to help quickly repair minor cuts and scrapes on my hands. Lavender is truly magic!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: While I personally don't like the smell of lavender mostly everyone else does, and it has so many good uses and is a staple in many oil kits. Great for sleep or soothing skin when mixed with a carrier oil. My personal favorite roller with lavender is peppermint, lavender, tea tree and blue tansy as a mosquito bite roller to remove the itch and soothe the skin.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: No exaggeration I diffuse this every single night before I sleep and I swear it makes a difference. it's exactly the right amount of calming scent without being overpowering. Now whenever I travel I complain to everyone that I don't have my lavender and I won't be able to sleep :) Guess I'll have to get a stick for the go!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If you don't have lavender in your life what are you doing!!!! Lavender is the perfect oil for you if you have trouble relaxing or sleeping. One way I use lavender is putting a couple drops on a wool dryer ball for my laundry. Hands down my favorite oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I received a lavender roll on as an add on and it smells lovely. Easy to use when you quickly need to. Overall, nice product.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The possibilities for lavender essential oil are endless. PT has a quality lavender oil and a reasonable price. Unless you really dislike the smell of lavender, this is an oil I believe everyone should have due to how versatile and easy to blend with other oils lavender is.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This was something that I never knew I needed, but it's really fantastic. This little bottle contains a very strong, concentrated lavender oil that can permeate the entire room. By simply dabbing a few drops on a cotton ball, or a small napkin / paper towel, the aroma really quickly fills the room. It does soothe me after a busy day and helps me sleep better at night. I've been at a few luxury hotels where they would have a similar scent in their rooms during turn down service and I'm so glad to now be able to have this in my own house. What's nice is that it's also safe as I have little ones running around the house.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Anxiety Reliever!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My daughter has eczema and very sensitive skin so it makes it hard to use conventional soaps and lotions or anything with harsh chemicals in it. IÕve used many lavender and essential oils over the years to try and treat her skin naturally. I was delighted by the quality of this oil, it has a very pleasant, relaxing scent and leaves no residue. Upon opening the bottle the scent took over the room and I felt like I was at a luxury spa. I used this along with a few drops of tea tree oil in my daughter's bath to help sooth her skin after a long day at the pool, and she slept through the night without waking due to itching and skin irritation that is caused by exposure to the chlorine. This oil has so many uses. I put a couple of drops in coconut oil as a hair mask for my dry scalp. Used it treat mosquito bites on my whole family and am also using it as a natural bug repellent. I canÕt wait to use this in my diffuser too. Great versatile oil that is highly concentrated so a little goes a long way.I will definitely buy again and again!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the first time that I have ever used any kind of essential oil. When I came across this product, it caught my attention because it is 100% organic is Kidsafe, which is a bonus for me.I mainly decided this would be a great product to try because both my son and I are restless sleepers and I figured trying something natural to help us relax during the night would be a good idea. I poured two drops of the oil on a cotton ball and spread the lavender oil on my sons pillow. I was pretty shockes that it took him a shorter amount of time to fall asleep. Which as a mom it is such a great a relief when our children fall asleep without fighting. I even poured a few drops onto the AC filter in my room after finding the suggestion online. As soon as I tirned the AC on the lavender smell was so refreshing and soothing. I could honestly say that I had a goodnights sleep with the scent of the lavender blowing through the AC. I will definitely be purchasing Plant Therapy essential oils in the future. I would reccomend the Lavendar essential oil to buyers who are looking for natural ways to relieve stress and relax.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my first essential oil ever. I have never used essential oils and really didnÕt have any idea how much they can help the body. Now I know and IÕm very impressed.This lavender is very calming I used it right before bed and not only did it smell amazing it really helped calm me down and help me sleep and many nights I need help sleeping. I also added a little to my non scented moisturizer. IÕm new to essential oils and this is an exciting new experience but I would say this is high quality , smells so goodness and very much worth getting for a calming effect.I was very happy to get to try this product. IÕm writing this review for the Walmart Spark reviews program and I recommend this Plant therapy Lavender essential oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This doesn't smell like the shampoo lavender you buy at the store. This is much much stronger than that. Comes in a little 10ML bottle and seems like it's going to last a good while. I am also putting it into my wax warmer when my wax loses its smell.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The first thing I did when I got this oil was read the outer label on the bottle and immediately went to my cabinet for a cotton ball. I followed the recommendation on the bottle and poured a few drops on the cotton ball, and went and laid down in bed with the cotton near my pillow. I was worried it would be too overpowering and give me a headache, but the aroma was very soothing and mild. I could feel the tension leaving my body as I soaked in the aroma. I use this method nightly as I climb into bed and it has helped me to fall asleep faster!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this stuff, I have several Lavender plants, and this oil does a really good job of capturing the smell of the whole plant, not just the flowers. The scent is really stong. Don't accidentally spill it somewhere. Luckly it's got a plastic piece in the top of the bottle that keeps you from using a lot of it at one time. First thing I did when I got it is take the lid off, and let it sit for a few minutes. it didn't take long for the smell to fill the room.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I got it packaged well. Lid was sealed and contents intact. When I opened it, I realized the aroma was strong. the oil is derived from English lavender flower. It is also a very concentrated concoction. It can be used in the laundry for refreshing clothes/sheets. I enjoyed the aroma as I used it in my reed diffuser. A few drops on the pillow gave a good night's sleep. Overall I'm very pleased with it.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I just recently got an essential oil diffuser and was excited to add lavender to my collection. Before a diffuser, I was using a nontoxic based essential oil lavender candle. So I have a high expectations when it comes to other lavender products. I was a little nervous that this wouldnÕt smell exactly how I expect lavender to smell, only because IÕve had that experience before with other things. Luckily, this essential oil from the bottle smells as itÕs advertised. I like how it states itÕs Òkid safe.Ó The bottle I got is a good starter size and is made of glass with a plastic top. An added bonus is that they put a purple ÒlavenderÓ label on top of the lid making it easy to identify out of my collection. Surprisingly, none of my other essential oils have this, so I always have to pick them up to see what oil it is. Great job Plant Therapy! On the back, the company even says how your can use your oil (a nice touch). When I pour the oil, it dispenses the drops at a consistent rate and doesnÕt run off the edge like other oils do. Once the lavender is diluted in water and diffused, it provides such a soothing atmosphere that immediately calms my body. The only thing that would make this even better is if it was certified organic. However, this isnÕt a dealbreaker for me and I believe Plant Therapy does have those options of organic.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender essential oil for pinkeye. My daughter gets pinkeye a couple times a year, it seems. It used to be so annoying to head to the doctor for every case of this, and get a prescription filled, and pour it in her eye, and quite often after the prescription was done, the pinkeye would come back. Now, I just use about a tablespoon of coconut oil mixed with a drop or two of lavender essential oil, mix them well, and put tiny bits of this around her eye (above, below, beside). This cures pinkeye faster than the prescriptions! And much cheaper and it is effective against both viral and bacterial strains (which prescriptions are not) and it doesn't worry me so much that I'm putting all this medicine into her, because it's all natural. I like buying directly from Plant Therapy, rather than through a large distributor like Walmart or Amazon where you can't be sure if you are getting the real thing or a fake. It's always great to support smaller companies as well. And I appreciate that Plant Therapy allows you to customize your order with the exact oils you most need and use, rather than forcing you to buy bundles of them like some of the other essential oil companies. I will be purchasing essential oils from Plant Therapy in the future.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender oil is an absolute staple in my home. From adding it to the laundry (no dryer sheets ever), to diffusing it with Cedarwood & sweet orange for restful night, this one is a must have. I also use it in balms, lotions, or diluted to give my skin the benefits of the oil, which seems to help breakouts & minor blemishes. I had previously been using another huge brand, and decided to give Plant Therapy a go after a recommendation from a trusted friend, & my own (week long) searching of all the company's ins & outs. My only qualm about this lavender is that is doesn't smell... the same, as my previous bottle. Almost like a musty version of what I'm used to. I can honestly say that, while I like it, I don't love it. I will, however, continue to use it, and will purchase again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My favorite oil to diffuse at night time! Such a great price.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I make essential oil blends but i still purchased pre -diluted lavender eo to see for myself if it's as effective as what i blend LOL. And yes, the pre-diluted lavender EO is soooo effective. So if you don't have time to make your own blend, i highly recommend that you try lavender first. It's a versatile eo! For itches, dry skin, relaxation, etc.

review: Love lavender essential oil I used it in a DIY Psoriasis ointment type thing for hubby; (don't know the outcome yet as these things take time) and I use one drop every night with my moisturizer had some extreme dry patches on my eyelids that were rough flaking off and looked ugly adding wrinkles to my eyes but within a week of using the lavender with my moisturizer on my face and around my eyes the flakiness and dry patches are gone. The skin around my eyes looks a lot better and healthier.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have purchased several bottles of lavender from PT and have always been pleased. However, the last bottle smelled off when I opened it. (The best way to describe it is like wet hay.) I contacted customer service, and they immediately sent a new bottle. Unfortunately, it smells the same way. Has the product changed? I will not be purchasing lavender from PT anymore. I really hope I don't start noticing quality issues with the other oils. I really like PT!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This smells exactly like the lavender we used at my spa in our towels. This takes me back to tranquil music and quiet afternoons. When I want a really relaxing bath, I mix 2 drops vetiver, 2 drops clary sage, 3 drops lavender. It's the best sleep aid.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My husband has a difficult time breathing at night. He uses a c-pap machine and even though that helps he was still getting very stopped up. I started combining Respir Aid Relax and lavender and it has made all the difference in the world! Now he sleeps peacefully every night and is not stopped up at all! Love my Plant Therapy Essential Oils!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Definitely a little overwhelming and not the light scent I was thinking it would be. it's definitely a heavy smell but I'm trying to use it anyways to see how it functions in a blend or in carrier oil. I'd probably purchase a Lavender Fine or Lavadin instead next time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love is an understatment. This coming from somone that used to toss and turn all night. I was so deserate to find the end all to me restlessness and I can safely say finding this was like finding gold. I use this mixed with witch hazel and spray pillow a half hour before I lay down for sleep. WOW its such a great invention

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This Lavender is fantastic. Amazing quality and the price just cant be beat. I diffuse it every night to help me go to sleep along with Cedarwood. I also made a spray with witch hazel to spray on my pillow at night. I also just sniff it right from the bottle when I want some calm. LOVE Lavendar...probably my favorite oil. I love Plant Therapy more and more with each oil I purchase!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I placed my first order with Plant Therapy I stupidly chose a 10 ml bottle of the Lavender Population. I am now going to fix that and order two 30 ml bottles. I adore this oil. I am prone to migraines and scents can really trigger them. This works so well in calming my headaches before they become migraines. I wish I could attach it to my nose. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender so crisp yet soothing

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If I burn myself while cooking I apply lavender. I myself do not dilute it. Yes there can be a bit of a sting but it goes away quickly. If I get a blister I sometimes apply it a second time an hour or so later. Then I totally forget I ever got burned. A week later I will wonder why my finger is peeling and think - ah yes! there was a burn there! Lavender also works well to help relieve sun burns sting.I can't say I myself love the smell...but it does the job!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was cooking pasta and while stirring I splashed a large amount of boiling water on my stomach I put water on the burn first then I rolled my lavender on it. Later in the day it started burning a bit so I rolled lavender on it again and the burn went away very quickly the burn is 4 days old now and still did not blister it is still very red but no blisters and has decreased in size alot. Plus lavender smells SO good.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender from plant therapy is strong and lasting. One drop truly goes a long way and that speaks to the purity of the product. Needless to say or something I use before I teach. It assists me in having a relaxed wonderful time creating art with children.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a must have oil for everything! It's 100% pure! I use it for skin care, my diffuser! I have used it in my hair for months and months! I don't wash my hair with generic shampoo, I make a blend with this oil and have seen awesome results for healthy hair!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I think I have 5 or 6 bottles of lavender that are in multiple rooms of the house, along with my purse. I try to never be without it. We use it for burns and bug bites. I roll it on pillows. I use it for anxiety. It's kind of a go to for everything oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm in the process of switching from another oil brand, and I heard about Plant Therapy. I had my doubts because the prices were amazing, but every oil I have tried has been amazing! The lavendar is a great quality and smells so good! Plus, I love that I can buy big bottles because it is my go-to oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender oil! I diffuse it almost every night and make sleep rollers with it for all my friends and family. I also love the fast shipping. It was awesome to get my lavender oil in just 2 days after I realized my original bottle was all out. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Used this on a second and third degree burn on my hand. Healed the second degree burn in a little over a day. The third degree blister only lasted one day and healed so quickly with the continued use of lavender. I didnt have to dress it as the pharmacist recommended. VERY IMPRESSED with the quality of this lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love it! I use it for my daughter to help her at night. We use Nighty Night. But just lavender sometimes. I use it with spearmint on bug bites and as a bug repellent. I also use it on my dog as a dog repellent. I also love diffusing it with many other eos. I love lavender and lemon.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is truly a great EO. I've purchased other lavender EO and this one has a true floral smell. Some I've purchased have a almost synthetic smell to them but when I open the bottle it reminded me of smelling a bouque of lavender stalks. Beautifully fragrant and not overpowering or stinging.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm new to Plant Therapy. I received my first shipment of oils today (order shipped in 2 days...FREE!). I was especially interested in comparing the lavender I ordered to the many other lavenders that I have. I popped a few drops into my diffuser as soon I the box was opened. This is an amazing oil and it has a richness to the aroma that is hard to describe. I'll be purchasing a larger bottle in the near future.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Don't know where to start! Lavender has myriad uses! Calming! Helps with sleep. Anti itch if bitten by an insect and great as a body spray for keeping insects away mixed with lemon grass. It helps with sleep. I add a few drops of it with Tea Tree oil to mask the smell of the Tea Tree oil, to my body lotion as I have very dry itchy skin. These are just a few of the uses and Plant Therapy Lavender is great!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If I had to choose one essential oil to have, this would be it. Lavender for me is a must! First, if I have any kind of skin issue...guess what I use? Lavender! It's great for all types of burns, insect bites, irritations, rashes, etc....pretty much any skin issue I have, I first go to lavender. Second, it is very safe and blends so well with many other oils. I use it in my diffuser all the time (often blended with lemon or peppermint or both)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Not my favorite but I got it because It's a useful oil. It's so versatile. Got it because I am clumsy and prone to cuts and blisters and lavender in aloe gel is soothing and helps healing. The scent of PT lavender smells better than other lavender products in my opinion. Other products reminds me of artificial air freshener

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I just want to say that I love this kid safe lavender, we diffuse this every night for my 3 yr old who has never been a good sleeper. We made a diluted roller for him, He loves this rolled on his feet and neck at night and has actually had a solid nights sleep!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I received this Lavendar and it had an off smell I looked for the test report and noticed the test report for the batch I received is not posted. This was weeks ago and the test report still isn't posted. Neither is the review I wrote over a week ago.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Best Smell Ever

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorite EO and Plant Therapy has my favorite lavender! Tried a bunch from different companies, including MLM and this one is my go to. Got the big 30 ml for my last order. Great for diffusing, in a roller ball and for my sugar scrubs. The price is right, too!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried other brands of lavender eo's and was less than impressed. I even thought I just may not like the scent of lavender. Then on a whim I tried Plant Therapy's lavender. Love at first whiff!! It smells so much more authentic, like a real lavender plant. I use it on my wool dryer balls along with lemon, for a pleasant laundry scent that my whole family loves.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is a staple in our house. I diffuse it at night to help with sleep. I also use it my bath products for some extra relaxation. Finally, I make roll ons for my kids. A little lavender roll on to prepare for bedtime goes a long way! Absolutely recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorite oils for so many reasons! It's calming for our family and I diffuse around bedtime for my little ones. I use it on dryer balls in the laundry since we don't use dryer sheets / chemicals. Our clothes always smell so nice and comforting. There are so many more ways to use lavender and I love how versatile it is!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love the lavender EO from Plant Therapy! We went through the 10ml bottle very quickly last month. My husband was wondering when we would get more lavender for our diffuser. We sleep so much better with this diffusing every night. I decided to buy the 100ml now we will sleep soundly again!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this lavender. I've used a discount brand for years but as soon as I smelled this one I switched immediately. We use this for everything: bug repellent bug bites burns disinfecting cuts soothing children gently disinfecting a newborn when it was exposed to hospital germs diffusing in the house. Everyday we use this.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: A close friend had been using essential oils for years. She swore by lavendar and peppermint. I always thought she was crazy for thinking it could really do anything. I thought it was some type of scam. However recently I was in need of something calming and for some reason I decided to give lavendar a try. I purchased the roll on of this oil and immediately I was convinced it was magic.Using this oil has brought me so much relief and relaxtion during some stressful situation. I just roll a small amount on my wrists take a quick whiff and almost immediately I am relaxed and at a much calmer state of mind. Within a week I was back to order the Relax Synergy. Love this company. Looking forward to purchasing a diffuser and drops in the near future!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm not normally a big lover of lavender BUT this is the exception. I absolutely love the smell of this and it really relaxes me. I diffuse it nightly along with bergamot lemon or tangerine and peppermint. We all sleep like champs! This lavender is a high quality lovely MUST HAVE for our household.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My favorite oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was nervous to buy lavender essential oil online because not all lavenders smell the same and I was scared I wasn't going to like the smell when I got it. I was pleasantly surprised because this lavender smells amazing and is so much cheaper than the lavender I was previously buying. Will definitely purchase again and I will probably buy it in bulk next time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is my favourite. I even redecorated my kitchen this month with lavander accesorises and I installed there a little difuser to difuze lavander anytime I want. I am so glad I discovered PT. I also put a few drops of lavander oil in the washing machine whenever I do the laundery so I can catch the aroma in my sheets.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried lavender essential oil from other companies and I love Plant Therapy's the best! I currently have it in a reed diffuser in my bathroom and I love the subtle scent every time I walk in or by the room. I have also used it in my skincare and like to add it to unscented lotion.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the second time purchasing this lavender oil. My first time as others have said I thought the smell was off. It did work however and when diluted and rubbed on skin put me to sleep very quickly. I ordered my second bottle and received today and it still smells off to me from a brand I have used in the past. To me it smells almost a little sour. Because it works I will keep but may try a different brand lavender to compare again. I like this oil to relax put in a bath and when needed for my kids. My daughter recently had her teen vaccines and I am using this as part of her detox since she had a reaction. Because of this I needed this oil quickly and fast shipping is always a plus with PT.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: at first i didn't really like the smell of lavender. It has an off smell to it. but my wife uses it for our laundry, and our clothes comes out smelling pretty good. Not too bad. It also has great benefits to using this oil, so we keep it stocked up all the time. Just ran out... need more.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I cannot live without this Lavender. Every time I place an order I throw a bottle of this on. We use Lavender everyday! I have restless Leg and I make a roller ball and put this on my feet when it starts acting up. We have bottles of this for every diffuser plus I keep it in my diaper bag and purse. We diffuse this during growth spurts so my kids can sleep thru it. I use to hate the smell of Lavender but this one I have no issues with.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought the 30ml bottle because I have 3 small kids and lavender is always the first thing I diffuse for sleeping or colds. I know this is great quality but when I compare Lavender with Lavandin I actually like the fragrance of Lavandin better (Hence the 4 stars).

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I recently decided to experiment with essential oils. I purchased about 20 different kinds of oil to make my own blends. I was surprised how versitle lavendar was. Had to get a refill soon after. Among other uses I put lavendar on my wool dryer balls for bedding...especially for our guest room. Love the soft gentle fragerance and it really helps to calm the mind.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love Lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is great and a bargain price! I recently decided to get away from an MLM I was a part of for 3 years. I was looking for authentic oils at a bargain price. This fits the bill. I use this oil for bedtime and relaxation when I do yoga or pilates in my room. It's a great addition to my oil collection!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I always have lavender on hand. This smells great. It's kids safe so I can use it on my grandsons boo boos too. Two of my favorite ways to use it is in the diffuser at night to help me sleep and I put a couple drops on a washcloth and throw in the dryer to make my laundry smell good.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender oil it's my favorite! I wasn't sure about this o e because of how it smelled in the bottle but once I diffused it I realized it's just that it was stronger and more concentrated than I was used to. My only complaint is that the test report for the lot my oil is from has not been posted. I keep checking back and it's still not there. Kind of unsettling.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have gotten lavender from various other companies but I must say I am hooked on plant Therapy's lavender! We use it for so many different reasons... diffusing laundry soap bath bombs shower gels etc and have found this to be most affordable and pure. Thanks plant therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender more than any other oil. I use it for burns scrapes and other skin ailments. I have used this oil on a massive bacon grease burn across the palm of my hand and amazingly I did not scar- this was done while camping and not at home with other means of self-care. I credit lavender 100%!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender has never been my favorite scent. I purchased Plant Therapy's lavender in a kit. I didn't think I would be using it much, but there are always recipes that call for lavender. I was surprised at how much I like this oil. I am more than half way through the bottle. I enjoyed the lavender so much that I also decided to try Plant Therapy's Lavandin oil as well. They are both great and I find myself using them almost everyday.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This essential oil is a must have for me. Anything from diffusing it and rubbing a bit under my nose to fall asleep, to applying onto blemishes, to calming babies down, it helps for so many things! Love how strong and pure this essential oil is. Thanks for a great, trust worthy product!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm brand new to essential oils and was really considering between this company and another. Boy, am I glad I tried PT! I decided to try their special offer to buy Lavender and get a Lemon free. I'd never tried either but wanted to try both (which I was super excited were KidSafe for my littles). I've been diffusing the Lavender at night before bedtime to help my kids sleep, and I really think it is working. I'm loving the Lemon for cleaning my kitchen. One drop down my garbage disposal helped it not smell anymore. Anyway, as a newbie to all this, I'm loving these products, their quality, and the knowledgeable staff at PT! What ultimately helped me choose these products was how helpful the company was in letting me know what was safe for my children. I love how simple they've made EOs.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: YUCK! Received quickly, BUT the Lavender smell is off

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: So glad this is available as a roll on! I really like to apply some on my wrists before going to bed. That way I get the calming benefits from the scent without having to use my diffuser at night. It also works great as a roll on perfume anytime! Lavender will always be a favorite for me, and this pre-diluted roll on is super convenient.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: One of my many uses for lavender. In a spray bottle to keep my dog off the goodrug; in my diffuser mixed with vetiver and chamomile for a great night's sleep; in a locket around my neck mixed with frankensence to help with my restless legs; etc etc. etc.....

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use this in my diffuser with eucalyptus oil. They make a great combo with a calming effect combined with therapeutic congestion relief. I keep my diffuser on my night stand and run it all night long. PT's oils are batch tested for purity and a great value for the quality oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorite oils... it is so versatile and relaxing. I use it for bug bites and in my diffuser necklace to keep me relaxed throughout the day. Also you can't beat the price for a 10 ml bottle. I love how the oils already have a sticker on the cap too!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have bed acne on my back and was told to put some tea tree oil on it. It didn't help much. Then i was told to put some clary sage which also didn't help. Finally i was told to put lavender. I have to admit lavender helped a lot but gave me bad headaches. I was putting lavender on my back before sleep so i pretty much was sleeping with the scent of it whole night. When i woke up in the morning i had headache. It happened several nights in the row, so I stopped. Headaches stopped also. Seems like it works for acne but somehow i get headaches from it.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We diffuse this oil every night right before we go to bed and leave it on until we wake up in the morning. My husband used to have a really hard time falling asleep but this oil has been a total game changer. On nights when he still struggles to fall asleep a little bit, I rub a couple drops on the bottom of his feet and he is good to go! I used to buy lavender from other, more expensive, brand name companies, but I like this lavender way more! Great quality at a price that doesn't break the bank :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I haven't purchased any other lavenders so I can't compare but I love this one. The oil smells great and is so versatile in its uses. Linen spray diffusing it works for everything. While I love other oils for their scent and properties if you could only have one oil this would be the one to have.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We used this in combination with Cedarwood in the diffuser for our puppy. He can get overly excited and it helped him calmed down a little. We used it in our room during the day to keep him calm and at night for the whole family to sleep better. A good product that benefits the whole family.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lovin It

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love Lavender Essential Oil for so many reasons - so many uses! A recent discovery is that you can put Lavender EO on cuts and scrapes and it DOESNT STING or BURN!! My kids love it and use it all the time! :) I love that they come to me and ask Mom is there an oil for _____?

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender was probably one of my first Plant Therapy oils years ago. It has so many uses... Calming spray for pillowcases DIY cleaning products soap making (still trying to master this one :0) and just diffused. It's a stable oil in our house. This one is a great quality and smells so much better than other lavender oils I've been gifted in the past. Husband took me to a real lavender field in the mountains one year and this bottle reminds me of that trip! This is legit.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I received a tip from a friend to use lavender for dry hands/chapped lips. In the winter I really struggle with this as we constantly have heating going in the house. I used the roll on for this and it was amazing from the first moment I used it. Apart from a lovely fragrance my hands and lips haven't felt this great in months!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is our most used oil that I am constantly reordering. Just this last time I went to use it and thought what HOW is it out already?! It can be used for SO MUCH! My daughter has sensitive skin so when she wants to scent her slime she makes she also uses this with no irritation. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is always in our home! the smaller size bottles are ideal for travel while the larger bottle is always accessible at home. Lav is diffused during restless nights or during Ltimes of stress. Lav is applieed to cuts, bug bites, minor burns, or other damaged skin once the active wound has haealed over. Lav is a go-to for headaches and has been helpful for a family member recovering from a Traumatic Brain Injury. It is also ideal for sore muscles. the list is endless for what Lav can do!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We started out using another more expensive brand of oils. We like this lavender oil sooo much better! We diffuse it every night in our bedroom with the kids and we also have a little tube of this that myself and my daughter smell all the time when we want to relax a little. It smells amazing!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I used to hate lavender, but plant therapy's lavender turned me into a lavender lover! I adore lavender and use it in everything now! However it can't be shipped when it's 107 degrees in Texas, the oil can't take that heat. So I have to wait till it cools down to order it again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The smell is very relaxing and instantly calms me down, the smell is very weak if I use it in my oil diffuser, so I just started carrying it around with me to smell, and I found that it reduces my stress and anxiety by a large margin. I also use it to do laundry and found a noticeable better smell in my sheets and clothes.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love your Lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We use lavender daily for skin irritations in lip balm in body butter for bug bites diffuse at bedtime...the list goes on. I am able to put it on my 5 yr old neat to give immediate relief for bug bites. I also mix it with coconut oil to treat her eczema outbreaks. This is our go to oil for so many uses! Great high quality product!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my first bottle of PT lavender. I had one that was gifted to me from another company. Wow what a difference! I have only used PT oils but who would turn down a gift...PT has never let me down and the lavender smells sooo much better. I love it!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the most versatile out there! Have a bug bite? Use lavender to soothe the itch and decrease swelling. Need to lower anxiety? Inhale or diffuse lavender. Need softer skin? Use lavender! There are SO many uses for this oil. I've been ordering oils for the last 8 months and have gone through 2-3 bottles of lavender already. You won't be disappointed!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I started using this EO from an MLM company until I had the chance to try a 2ml sampler from a friend and the benefit is just the same with a more affordable price. So I decided to buy my own kit from Plant Therapy. Will write another review once I receive it...

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My *primary concern* is that the test report for the lavender batch I received (L40111) is not posted. The customer service rep I spoke with said they would post it as soon as they can. I hope Plant Therapy is not selling oils before they have received an acceptable test report! My secondary concern: The bottle of lavender oil I received smelled horrible (completely unlike any lavender I have ever smelled before). I contacted customer service and was told I received a green batch. I will follow their instructions and store it for a couple months and hopefully the smell will drastically improve. In the meantime they sent me a complimentary replacement (reason for 2 stars instead of 1). I will update to 3 stars if this lavender does actually improve after sitting on the shelf for a couple months.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I definitely love me some lavender! However at first I was surprised that straight out of the bottle to me it smelled, almost sour? I was surprised and skeptical it would smell as I expected once diffused. I am happy to report that once diffused it smelled to me as lavender should. I think I still prefer lavender fine, but I am happy with this version regardless. I add it into so many combinations of scents, I'm glad I got a large bottle.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I can't decide for certain whether lavender is my favorite oil in my collection, but it is definitely my most used! I'm very thankful it is one of the more easily affordable oils, because I fly through the stuff haha. I use it in the majority of my diffuser blends, roller ball blends, in my laundry, and DIYs. It is very useful with one of my dogs as well - he has anxiety and gets nervous very easily. When I put some lavender, diluted in carrier oil, on my wrists, it is visibly calming to him. He comes over to me immediately, sniffing my wrists, and wants to curl right up with me. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've reorder lavender about a million times at this point!it's a staple in our household in every way. Some of my favorite ways to use it are: adding a few drops to epsom salt baths making homemade body scrubs diffusing at night before bed to calm the mind and a million other ways.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Use it daily

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I didn't love much lavender until I discovered essential oils. But even after that I don't use it as much as I would like to because I've heard it lowers the blood pressure and mine is already low... But I appreciate the smell and my mother loves it! One of the blends that includes lavender that I use more often is Relax you can instantly sense the lavender among the other oils.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this lavender oil. I'll never buy lavender from anywhere else. I use it for so many things. I mix it with tea tree in the clear complex carrier and use it to moisturize my face. I mix it in aloe jelly for sunburns and scars. I diffuse it in the evening to help relax everyone. Its just the best so many uses!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is the greatest oil in the world! Use it every night to help me sleep. My kids love it too. Plant therapy lavender is fantastic. I've smelled Young living lavender and you can't tell the difference except your wallet can tell the difference.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favourite scents ever. French lavender specifically. This smells like lavender but i personally find it too sharp upfront to seem relaxing to me. It is better once diluted a ton so I guess a little goes a long way. In a face oil this is beautiful. I only needed 1-2 drops in 1 oz.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have never been a lavender fan but what a wonderful difference this is. I put a few drops on a makeup sponge and put it inside my pillowcase and it relaxes me and lulls me to sleep. The fragrance is so refreshing not perfumy like most lavender. I am new to essential oils and lavender is by far my number 1 scent.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I LOVE love love lavender. It's an oil that belongs in every single collection. I've used 5 different brands of lavender and still Plant Therapy's is the best. Smells amazing makes me feel so relaxed and I feel safe using it on my children. Love this company and love this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the second time buying this oil. The first time came as a shock when I first got it because I was used to the other lavender. However over time I have come to love this scent and use it often for relaxation or to add to other oils in my diffuser. Well worth buying it but know there are different types of lavender.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Im in love with Plant Therapy Oils and Tthe Lavender is one of my favorites. I use it for minor burns mix it with Plant Therapy Peppermint oil and a carrier oil to make a headache roller. It is usable for so many things. I highly recommend you order this product.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Quality over all

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I just opened a my 30 ML bottle that I purchased during the sales in December and I'm pretty sure I got a bad batch or something! I have a tiny bit of my previous 30 ML left and my new bottle smells nothing like it! I even let my daughter smell the new bottle ( PT's lavender is her favorite) and she couldn't even place the smell or tell me that it was lavender. Just made a yucky face. Usually I love PT's lavender but not this time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Every house must have Lavender in their cabinet, whether they are hardcore, just starting or general EO users. This is in my opinion the most versatile, functional and easy to use oil out there. It has SO MANY uses that I can not even begin to list them and It blends well with many oils as well. When people ask me about EO I always recommend Lavender as their first oil!! So go ahead and get the big bottle you won't regret it!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: It's just simply one of the best single oils out there!! Ever!! What can't you use it for???!! However one simple suggestion! Go for the organic one, it's stronger and hey it's good to support all things organic! Better for us and the environment, and also just a Couple more dollars!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love that PT products are safe and trustworthy. I've bought cheaper brands of lavender but after looking at their labels or smelling them, refused to use them. Wasted money! I only trust PT for myself and my family. This lavender is the best I have found and is already a great price!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If you are unsure of where to start with essential oils I definitely recommend lavender. I was never fond of the smell of lavender or any other floral scents however this lavender smells good. They help me to relax and calm down whenever I begin to feel anxious. I feel safe using this product versus oils from other companies and I trust it to use around children. I am on my third bottle and will be purchasing a larger bottle since I do use it a lot. This oil is great for relaxing you after a long day at times when you feel stressed or whenever you need help falling asleep. I definitely recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was searching for a good company to buy essential oils from that didn't cost a fortune. Plant Therapy's reputation and sourcing is superb and I started with this Lavender to try out this company. It arrived packaged well love the free shipping/returns so it's basically risk free to try out an oil. I LOVE this lavender scent. It is amazing relaxing beautiful! I use it at bedtime I use it on a lava bracelet I diffuse it throughout the day alone or with peppermint or lemon and it is just amazing. Since then I have been hooked on Plant Therapy and have gone on to buy SO many more bottles and have not been disappointed.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have used lavender for years a variety of brands and I have always found 100s of uses. I ordered this lavender from plant therapy and unfortunately the smell of this brand was not my favorite. I would like to note that I very much appreciated the ability and ease to text my return. My claim was handled in minutes. I could not be happier with the customer service!! I look forward to using other oils from plant therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: What is there to say about lavender? it's a staple. I use it more days than not. This one is a high quality and lovely. I have had many different lavender oils before from different companies and this one is probably my favorite. There are not many blends that I create that don't have lavender in it so I ordered a 100ml bottle. I haven't tried the lavender fine yet so I can't compare the two but honestly this one works wonderfully for everything I've needed it for so far.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Don't be caught without PLant Therapy lavender.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Not only does this make my bathroom smell like a dream, I use it in my homemade buy repellent....which always gets compliments and works phenomenal. I have to put some pretty stinky oils (true!) In there to be effective against ticks, but this just covers all that up so nicely. Never want to be without lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm going to need to order the big bottle next time because I use lavender for SO many things. It's one of those super versatile oils that blends well with others and for me is a must-have. I use it twice a day by mixing a few drops with hyaluronic acid and applying to clean skin to control sebum production. My makeup has NEVER looked so fresh for 8 - 12 hrs at a time! I also use lavender in a makeup setting spray I make as well as ointments face cream diffusing etc. It's just an amazing oil and Plant Therapy has a great quality lavender for an even greater price. You will not be disappointed!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: my PT lavender relationship was not love at first smell kind of history. i have used the lavender of mlm company and PT lavender was too strong and sonplant smell for me at first. but as time goes by, i became adopted to it and slowly fall in love! just yesterday, i saw the small bottle of my mlm lavender and compared it to PT, and lo and behold! i cant tell the difference anymore. im loving lavender so much that from 5ml bottle (mlm) i have upgraded to 10ml (PT), now im finishing my 2nd 30ml and thinking of buying 100ml on the last day of jcam.. thank you soooo much plant therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of the EO called for in so many recipes but it didn't use to be one of my favorites. However now I couldn't do without it. I guess you could say it grew on me. I love to diffuse it now with geranium and ylang and this combo doesn't seem to bother my dog. It's like a walk in the flower garden.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This has always been my go-to lavender essential oil, so I have always bought this without much thought about the other types of lavender oils. Just recently, I bought this oil again, but had previously purchased lavender fine, which was an add-on with a purchase. I still had a bit left, so was able to do a side-by-side sniff test, and was surprised by the difference in aromas of both types. Lavender fine is softer and sweeter and more vibrant, while the straight lavender is more herbal and grassy. Both are amazing oils!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I started using essential oils several years ago lavender was not my favorite. I have since learned to love it and it is now one of the oils I can't live without. In the past I used to purchase from one of the over priced companies and just purchased my first bottle from plant therapy. I am so pleased! The quality is excellent and this is the lavender I'll always have in my home now!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have both Lavandin and Lavender and I have to say that I have used the entire bottle of Lavender and only a few drops of the Lavandin. There s just something magical and wonderful about this oil! I will be buying the 30mL the next time I put an order in since I used it up so quickly! :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is awesome! I just got the bigger size because I was going through the 10ml size pretty fast. Since lavender is in a lot of my recipies I go through it quickly. I've used different brands of essential oils and Plant therapy is far and away my first choice.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: A Staple

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a lovely oil and can be used in so many ways to enjoy its aroma as well as in a number of therapeutic applications. In my opinion there is no aromatherapy without Lavender. It calms the mind and soothes the skin. Plant Therapy sells high quality Lavender at affordable price.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love using the diluted roll-on on my face and my skin loves it too. I touch a little wherever I have any redness or signs of a blemish and rub it in. Very effective and something I always have on hand. I also use Lavender on cuts to help stop the bleeding.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love that I can purchase a big bottle of this lavender, which has the most amazing lavender smell! I use it for my dryer balls and it works amazing along with the lemongrass essential oil! I put both oils on the wool dryer balls, And my sheets and towels come out smelling amazing that last for days

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love the scent!! This is one of the three oils I use for year round allergies. My family and I are prone to them but more so my kids. At night I put a few drops of this along with lemon and peppermint oils into the diffusers I have set up in each bedroom. It has really helped everyone to stay feeling better longer. Absolute must have in my stash!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my favorite oil in my collection because of how versatile it is. I put this in a roller and it is great for healing of cuts burns bug bites etc. It has such an amazing calming smell that it is also my favorite oil to diffuse. Perfect for bedtime alone or even with Eucalyptus if you are trying to ward off a cough. Highly recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried several brands of essential oils (including MLMs) and Plant Therapy's oils, especially their Lavender, are by far my favorite. The smell is amazing and the quality is superior. My two go-to uses for Lavender are; added to a eco-friendly unscented laundry detergent for great smelling laundry and I use it in a roll-on each night for better sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: have been ordering the 10ml for about a year and just ordered the 30ml because we use it so much in our nighttime diffuser! hoping the quality in the bigger size matches the quality of the 10ml. love that the lavender has a natural, woodsy scent alongside the floral notes -- feels more real than the stuff you find on other sites. can't sleep without it now!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have chronic dibilatating migraines and I use the lavender in a roller ball mixed with peppermint eo to rub on my forehead and temples. It's very soothing and distracts me from the pain. I also add a few drops of lavender to Epsom salts when taking a bath to help me unwind and get my mind and body ready for sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Must Have Oil !!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I thought I loved lavender and was excited to get it. This oil has a pungent almost sour quality to it that made it hard for me to relax and enjoy the scent. It is still somewhat relaxing but because I dont enjoy the smell it doesnt make me feel content and at ease. This is Bulgarian lavender and Ive read that lavender from other countries like Hungary or Greece smell lighter so that may have been the kind of lavender I remember loving. I also did some research and found out that most lavender-scented products like lotions and candles smell much different than pure lavender oil. The lavender essential oil I had from a lower quality brand had a milder more flowery scent that I enjoyed more but I think this one is the better choice since its higher quality.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I suffer with chronic anxiety and am unable to take prescription antidepressants as they react badly with my Cerebral Palsy causing rigidity and increased muscle spasticity. Lavender EO has become a wonderful addition to my meditation therapeutic touch massage and other holistic interventions to manage my anxiety.
