I use a pre-diluted roll-on applied to my wrists chest and behind my ears as a source of comfort at those times when anxiety is triggered. Ive also enjoyed diffusing lavender alone or with frankincense for a soothing calming environment.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use this on my wool balls in the dryer, to diffuse in our bedroom, and to make lip balms. They are a huge seller for me! I love the relaxing smell on our clothes, and the calming atmosphere in our room helps my husband sleep during the day as he works nights.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is great. I use it for all kinds of things. In my diffuser to help me sleep at night, in my face serums, on bug bites and cuts and scratches. I also put it in coconut oil and use it to help with sunburns. I haven't peeled after a sunburn since I started using lavender like this.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Burned a finger, started to blister, applied a drop directly to area; after about a minute, the burning sensation went away and the blister didn't actually form. I use a couple drops on my pillowcase. I also use this oil on eczema and it starts healing in a day. I will never be without this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is absolutely essential when you are a human. Headaches, bug bites, scratches, accidentally getting super glue on your skin - this stuff does it all and then some! I find it calming only along with frankincense - the two together on your hands and then cupped over your face quickly with deep breaths can get a teen with an anxiety issue back off the ceiling in no time flat!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I will never be without lavender essential oil. It is good for so many things. I use it in my DIY skin care I diffuse it everywhere I have an aromatherapy inhaler that I keep in my purse with it and keep it at my bedside to rub into my temples before sleep and I sleep like a baby. I think PT makes the best quality one I have tried many and none compare.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The lavender smells great and pretty strong so a little goes a long way and the price is great. No need to buy more expensive products to get high quality oils here at Plant Therapy the prices are low and the oils are high in quality and pure. Plus they have the choice of organic oils also at a great price. Not to mention excellent customer service free shipping and returns.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender love

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is as good as any of the big brands (I have oils from YL and Doterra), and Plant Therapy's works + smells just the same - for a fraction of the price. I use this to diffuse together with peppermint and lemon as an immunity boost for my kids when they sleep, and I also use it on cuts and nicks (especially when our puppy bites and scratches us). I'd definitely be buying more.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I put this in my sons bath while he plays with his toys and I also put a few drops in his body wash too. It helps him to relax before he goes to bed. I bought a 30ml and used that fast so I just purchased a 100ml so hopefully it ll last a little longer haha

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When using wool dryer balls, I've noticed some oils don't put off much of a scent on the items in the dryer. That's not the case with lavender. This one works perfectly for that! I made a sunburn lotion with it (and a couple other oils) and didn't peel. Definitely had to be the lavender because normally I always peel. Another bonus is that it's strong in the diffuser so you don't have to use very much.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Scent is there but doesn't seem to work as fast to calm my toddlers as other lavender oils I've bought. Hoping to blend of with other oils maybe it will help. The scent doesn't last when I apply it topically. I seem to be using more to really get the scent to be strong.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I find myself running out of Lavender faster than any other oil I own because I seem to use it in all the blends. It features heavy over here and I also use it mixed with Frankincense and jojoba oil on my skin along with a regular skincare routine and it has helped so much. Love love love Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought this oil because everyone says it's a must so I decided to give it a try despite that I wasn't a fan of lavender aroma. Plant Therapy made me love lavender. This oil is absolutely delicious the aroma is fresh - not the usual cloy floral I was expecting (and the reason why I was hesitant about lavender before). Also this oil works wonders. I diffuse it when I have headaches and it relieves the pain within minutes and it's my go-to to add into my hands creams for before bed to have a restful night sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I really like the more subtle smell of the lavendin compared to lavender oil. I really like lavender, but like being able to mix it up a bit. I often diffuse 2-3 drops at night time to settle everyone down for the evening. I have used, and liked it, used at the same time as nighty night and sniffle stopper. I also use it as a personal diffuser for mild stress to relax.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: So calming, helps the whole family sleep, great for irritated skin! Smells wonderful! I out it in a roller for my daughter and roll iron her in the evening before bed! Calming benefits! It is wonderful to diffuse. This oil also mixes well with other oils and smells great!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: REAL Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I continue to be amazed that Lavender Essential Oil can do all it does. The calming effect when used in aromatherapy is amazing. I let the scent in my area calm me soothe the emotions that seemingly are destroying the good day and then I realize the reason is the Lavender Oil in my diffuser. I was never a big believer in that before-back just a few years ago-but when you allow the aroma diffuser to do its thing you can better do yours. Then there is the assistance to easing the pain in my knees. I have arthritis and it can stop you cold but with the aroma therapy and application to my knees well I get back into the mainstream. You too can find it because Lavender has that effect on just about all who use it.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I don't have a hard time falling asleep. I have a hard time getting back to sleep once I get up to go to the bathroom. I decided instead of taking Melatonin every night I would alternate the Melatonin with Lavender Essential Oil. All I can say is I love it! This purchase has helped me to decide that from now on I am going to try Essential Oils instead of taking pills for any problems I may have. It appears that Plant Therapy has an oil for everything! I suggest buying a small bottle of Lavender in case it doesn't work for you then you didn't spend too much. I will be purchasing a bigger bottle of Lavender in the near future!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love PT's Lavender! You can buy an100ml container for the price of a 5ml from Y** L** or D*T**. You can trust PT to have pure oil for a price that fits in your budget. It smells just like lavender should smell and it's not diluted! Safe to use on children and on chickens! If you don't have lavender you are missing out! This is a must have for your collection! I love Plant Therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this oil. First of all it's kid safe and safe for use on chickens!! Second, I appreciate that it pairs great with lemon for diffusing! Adding peppermint with those two said oils and you have a blend to fight allergies. Love it! It's a great price too for an oil comparable to those MLM lavenders for a portion of the price!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I swear by this stuff my husband even notices a difference. We went away a couple of weeks ago stay in a nice place. He said bring your diffuser so you can make the room smell homey with your oils....i diffused the Lavendar and vanilla...Wow rave reviews!!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm in the process of switching from another oil brand, and I heard about Plant Therapy. I had my doubts because the prices were amazing, but every oil I have tried has been amazing! The lavendar is a great quality and smells so good! Plus, I love that I can buy big bottles because it is my go-to oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've always hated lavender scents just ick. Well I needed a new sleep oil to rotate with my other blends and since It's spring I thought I would try lavender with ylang ylang for a floral sleepy scent. OMG It's so lovely! I won't be saying I love lavender anytime soon but It's growing on me. :D

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favourite scents ever. French lavender specifically. This smells like lavender but i personally find it too sharp upfront to seem relaxing to me. It is better once diluted a ton so I guess a little goes a long way. In a face oil this is beautiful. I only needed 1-2 drops in 1 oz.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The lavender smells great and pretty strong so a little goes a long way and the price is great. No need to buy more expensive products to get high quality oils here at Plant Therapy the prices are low and the oils are high in quality and pure. Plus they have the choice of organic oils also at a great price. Not to mention excellent customer service free shipping and returns.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: just as great as a mlm company!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: A close friend had been using essential oils for years. She swore by lavendar and peppermint. I always thought she was crazy for thinking it could really do anything. I thought it was some type of scam. However recently I was in need of something calming and for some reason I decided to give lavendar a try. I purchased the roll on of this oil and immediately I was convinced it was magic.Using this oil has brought me so much relief and relaxtion during some stressful situation. I just roll a small amount on my wrists take a quick whiff and almost immediately I am relaxed and at a much calmer state of mind. Within a week I was back to order the Relax Synergy. Love this company. Looking forward to purchasing a diffuser and drops in the near future!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I got my large bottle in the mail today and I'm not sure about the quality of this lavender. It smells almost like it has peppermint mixed into it. I had been using Whole Foods brand Bulgarian Lavender prior to buying this and was VERY happy with it. I thought this was going to be a similar scent but it is much sweeter. Much more mild. I was looking for sharp and fresh. Maybe lavender fine is the one I should've gotten. And now JCAM is over so I probably can't get the same deal if I made an exchange.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Several months ago I switched to Plant a Therapy essential oils exclusively. Lavender is one of my go to's every day and yours excels in scent depth and lasting effects in my diffuser. Best I have ever used. I am sold on your EO's for life! Thank you for putting so much into your research and product!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is a staple in our house. I diffuse it at night to help with sleep. I also use it my bath products for some extra relaxation. Finally, I make roll ons for my kids. A little lavender roll on to prepare for bedtime goes a long way! Absolutely recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I do like this oil and I use it in a lot of my blends specifically with a citrus oil and vetiver before bed. So nice to drift off to sleep to that combination of smells. 4 stars because I'm not a huge fan of the scent by itself tho everyone's nose is different!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a ... or should be ... a go-to essence. Unfortunately, commercially, it never really smells or has the aromatic effect that true Lavender Essential Oil has. If one is seeking all of the effects of Lavender, he/she has to go straight to the source ... Plant Therapy Essential Oils.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought the Lavender roll on blend as an add on purchase during the 25 Days of Christmas. I love lavender for so many reasons but mostly skin care and to help me sleep. I use the roll on at night right before bed and it helps me to relax and fall asleep faster.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: You know at first I didn't really care for lavender.....but it was one if the first bottles I emptied. Then later on I realized how much I like it when I ended up with 5 bottles of different kinds of lavender. Yep. I love lavender. Use it all the time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I guess after having the cavierar of Essential Oils it's hard to find something to compare with. This was a total letdown. I use a C-Pap machine after the Army I started holding my breath when I slept now it's a serious problem insomnia is a terrible problem for me I use lavender oil in my meditation to help me get to sleep this product wears out in about 10 to 15 minutes doTerra lasted more than an hour with one drop for the doTerra and six drops for Plant Therapy. Not a great product for me.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love it!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: OMG! Literally the best sunburn reliever oil ever! My daughter got a slight sunburn the other day (even after putting sunscreen lotion on her every 20 minutes) put some on her and it was gone the next day. I just bought the Lavender Aloe Vera Gel. I can't wait to receive it and try it out on sunburns!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have three different lavender oils that I use this one is my favorite for making lavender water! Also for scenting jojoba oil. This one has the clearest and most fragrant scent of the three. I have tried both the organic and the standard oils. Because I can't always afford the organic I am very pleased that the standard is also excellent in scent. It is slightly heavier than the organic but they are very close. Thank you for providing a vast selection of wonderful oils!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought this essential oil to help with my anxiety and it did the opposite of helping because the scent is overpowering. Idk what is in this oil there is something else added to it that makes the scent very overpowering and artificial smelling. Also I put a little bit of it on my lava rock bracelet and the smell would not go away even after I washed it with soap and water, and showered with it on 3 days in a row. I even accidentally washed my bracelet in the washing machine and it still smelled like fake lavender. I would look elsewhere if you wand a calm soothing lavender essential oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Everyone needs to have this in their collection! It is the best oil to have for relaxation. If you have a ton of anxiety get this oil because it helps calm your nerves! I work in a hospital and they use this oil all the time to calm patients down when they are worried or having panic attacks. It really works wonders. Plus you can blend it with almost any floral or citrus! It helps when you have trouble sleeping too. It is one amazing oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: i have smelled many lavender oils in my life and this by far is the freshest most pleasing clean lavender scent i have ever and will ever own is go to for when you just are not sure what to use very universal oil also helps all other oils work well keep on making great oils love everyone i have purchased

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I usually am not a fan of Lavender anything but this lavender is tolerable. I can usually diffuse this in a blend and hide the more powerful notes that comes with is. I like it for the properties that is gives so I will continue to be using this oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My wife and I recently got into diffusing essential oils. We have lavender plants on our property and frequently cut/dry them to fill our house with an amazing smell. We diffused this lavender oil from Plant Therapy and couldn't believe how incredible the house smelled! No more cutting and drying lavender for us! Excellent product high quality and worth every penny. Will be re-ordering.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was nervous to buy lavender essential oil online because not all lavenders smell the same and I was scared I wasn't going to like the smell when I got it. I was pleasantly surprised because this lavender smells amazing and is so much cheaper than the lavender I was previously buying. Will definitely purchase again and I will probably buy it in bulk next time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorite EO and Plant Therapy has my favorite lavender! Tried a bunch from different companies, including MLM and this one is my go to. Got the big 30 ml for my last order. Great for diffusing, in a roller ball and for my sugar scrubs. The price is right, too!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender Hater Converted

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Awesome! Smells so good! Diffuse it with peppermint and lemon- and that makes the perfect allergy blend! (You can make the same blend in a personal inhaler). Put lavender on skin burns without a carrier oil it helps to soothe skin problems. Aromatherapy-wise it really does have a calming effect.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love the lavender EO from Plant Therapy! We went through the 10ml bottle very quickly last month. My husband was wondering when we would get more lavender for our diffuser. We sleep so much better with this diffusing every night. I decided to buy the 100ml now we will sleep soundly again!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My sister gifted me lavender in a set to get me started on my oily journey. it's an oil that pretty much every home should have (I understand some people are sensitive or have adverse effects from it). I've used this for a calming scent to diffuse for sleep diffuse blends as well as mixed with a carrier oil to calm my rosacea.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm not a big fan of lavender scent but it's so fun to look up what lavender can do since it's just so versatile! I uses it for acnes remedy and I personally feel they went away quicker. Although I read some aromatherapists said lavender and tea tree are the only 2 oil we can directly apply on skin, I still feel a little bit too strong when doing so. So, I'd recommend to still dilute with our skin care product/ carrier oil and apply topically

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I couldn't believe the price difference of this lavender compared to other companies. When I got it I compared 3 different lavender oils and this one was by far the strongest and best smelling! We love using this for burns or bug bites as well as making our own lotion bar sleepy sticks. Such a great value to use for body products!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this lavender. I've used a discount brand for years but as soon as I smelled this one I switched immediately. We use this for everything: bug repellent bug bites burns disinfecting cuts soothing children gently disinfecting a newborn when it was exposed to hospital germs diffusing in the house. Everyday we use this.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This one is so versatile. I made a roller ball application (sunflower seed carrier oil) and it worked so well on my mild psoriasis outbreaks (mostly caused by stress). I apply it on my elbows most of the time. I also use it for bedtime (diffusing along with a few drops of peppermint and tea tree) as it aids in providing quality sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've tried many lavender essential oils, simply because it's the little black dress of all oils. However, this one is different: it's crisp yet soothing. It doesn't have that annoying after scent unlike some out there. This is how you can tell an oil has been properly distilled. And because of it, a little bit goes a long way.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender in a diffuser makes my home smell calming and pleasant. I use it with a couple of other oils for my dogs flea and tick prevention. I also use it in a face serum. I love its versatility ! Thank you Plant Therapy for getting essential oils we can trust!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When in doubt just use Lavender.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorites. I use it for everything, for fragrance, to boost immunity, aromatherapy and in lotions. My daughter was having trouble falling asleep so I started diffusing it in her room and suddenly I was falling asleep before she was!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm not usually a fan of lavender scented things, but I needed this oil for some therapeutic properties. I was actually surprised that I liked it! I like to blend it with bergamot to diffuse for sleep. I will also be using it to help relax while I am in labor soon.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: love this bottle of lavender!! i keep an extra in the house all the time. and one in my purse. when i burned my hand i put lavender on it for a week and no scars. can't even tell where the 3rd degree burns were. i mix this with baking soda and sprinkle on my carpet then vacuum. my carpet is fresh and somehow looks cleaner! :) so so many different uses. GET A BOTTLE or TWO!!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'd never try to live without this oil. it's a staple! it's listed in so many recipes for DIY. It Blends so well with so many other oils in the diffuser or my rollers. And thankfully it's so affordable! At this point I just get myself the 100 ml. :-)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My wife and I diffuse Lavender Oil by itself and many times combined with other oils. We are always sure to keep Lavender oil in our stock of various oils. It adds a calming effect as well as having such a pleasant odor. It is by far our favorite non-blended oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love the calming scent of Plant Therapy's Lavender essential oil. I always keep a bottle or two on hand. It helps out with my pollen allergies by allowing me to breathe better too! I also add it to my fragrance free body lotion and use to moisturize my skin.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought the 30ml bottle because I have 3 small kids and lavender is always the first thing I diffuse for sleeping or colds. I know this is great quality but when I compare Lavender with Lavandin I actually like the fragrance of Lavandin better (Hence the 4 stars).

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Who doesn't love lavender!? This is a MUST have oil. I diffuse this at bedtime to help me sleep. I love mixing it with patchouli vanilla peppermint or lemon to make my whole house smell amazing. Lavender is hands down my favorite scent! So many uses and is complimentary with almost any other oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've never been a very big fan of the smell of lavender. But bought one from another brand as one of my first EO's and it was okay. Then I found PT and bought this one and from the first time I diffuser it in my bedroom before bed I've been in love with it! It a bit milder lavender smell than the one I had before and to me this is perfect!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Just as great as expensive brands!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I swear by this stuff my husband even notices a difference. We went away a couple of weeks ago stay in a nice place. He said bring your diffuser so you can make the room smell homey with your oils....i diffused the Lavendar and vanilla...Wow rave reviews!!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Who doesn't know lavender? I think this is the most versatile oil out there.can't sleep? Lavender. Cuts and scrapes? Lavender. Stale smelling room? Lavender. Skin issues? Lavender. Pain and aches? Lavender. Stressed out? Lavender. LolI keep a huge bottle of this in my fridge for literally everything for when other oils are missing in action.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have disliked the smell of lavender since forever. I get an instant headache walking down the laundry aisle. This is not the same!!!!!!!!! I would never in a million years thought I'd own anything Lavender but it was offered to me at checkout during the 20% off deal so it was only $4! I figure if I didn't like it I could give it to my Mom. Well I love it and it doesn't give me a headache!!! Yay! :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I should have done my research on the different lavender oils offered. I was expecting it to smell like a bundle of lavender and it does not. It smells kinda sweet and sticky for lack of a better description. I bought it it diffuse in my pet grooming shop, so it will work for that purpose, but not in my home. It is not the scent for me.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is by far one of my favorite and most frequently used oils. It smells just as you would expect absolutely beautiful. I use it in my homemade soap diffuser blends sleepy time roll-ones and it is great in burns. If you burn yourself cooking a lot like I do just put a few drops on the burn undiluted and it eases the pain instantly. It also helps prevent scarring.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought this lavender oil to use in my face oils I use to moisturize my skin because It's supposed to be good for your skin. Unfortunately I had itchy red blotches on my skin where I had used it so I won't use it on my skin anymore since I seem to be sensitive to lavender. However I've used it in bath bombs that my kids love using and it helped calm a rash my daughter had along with peppermint oil. I don't really like the smell of lavender but it combines well with other oils. I'll keep it on hand for It's therapeutic properties.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was so excited to try out this brand of oils. I got bergamot and cedar wood on top of this lavender and loved those two. However, the lavender doesn't smell like lavender at all. To be quite frank, it stinks and smells like basil or something was put in there by mistake. I'm very disappointed because this was the oil I was looking forward to the most in this order. I'll be buying the others oils again, but I can't stand the lavender and don't see myself buying it again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I just want to say that I love this kid safe lavender, we diffuse this every night for my 3 yr old who has never been a good sleeper. We made a diluted roller for him, He loves this rolled on his feet and neck at night and has actually had a solid nights sleep!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm not normally a big lover of lavender BUT this is the exception. I absolutely love the smell of this and it really relaxes me. I diffuse it nightly along with bergamot lemon or tangerine and peppermint. We all sleep like champs! This lavender is a high quality lovely MUST HAVE for our household.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: So many uses!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: lavender is a must have for me and a must have for anyone who's interested in essential oils, whether you're brand new to them or a seasoned user like myself. this lavender has a great smell and is a great value for the price. i've been happy with all of my purchases from PT so far. :slightly_smiling:

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am new to oils and just started using Lavender. It was one of the first oils I have bought and I go through so much of it. I actually upgraded to the 30 ml bottle and I go through that rather quickly too. it's easy to use and great quality. I use it in so many different products and cleaners I make. We diffuse it often as well. Lavender is so versatile.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use this for so much! A couple drops in the diffuser as the kids are getting ready for bed and they fall asleep much quicker. I add it to all my skin blends. Has helped reduce arthritic joint pain. I use on bruises and cuts to help them heal faster. Lavender has around 40 helpful properties it is a must have!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My go to for everything. I love that it comes in a larger size bottle because I use this so much. It's one of my favorite scents and it's really mild to use around the children. I like to diffuse it or dilute it in a roller or dilute it to go in bath to relax me or the kids

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is definitely my go to for oils. Good for stress relief safe on kids and great for skin and healing! Lavender has a light scent that can be combined with so many other oils in a diffuser and can even be added to tea! I loooove lavender and this one is the best I have used!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my all time favorite oil. I love it by itself and in addition to other oils. it's also the best lavender of any essential oil company I've ever used. I wish I had gotten it in a larger bottle which I'll do next time I need to buy it. Definitely a staple! Also was recently pregnant and had a lot of back pain and used this daily. It instantly relieved it and made me feel great!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I received this Lavendar and it had an off smell I looked for the test report and noticed the test report for the batch I received is not posted. This was weeks ago and the test report still isn't posted. Neither is the review I wrote over a week ago.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Dear Lavender, my bosom buddy at bedtime and when I so desperately need time on my yoga mat. Not only does diffusing you help me in relaxing my mind that often doesn't stop going even when I am exhausted and have my fuzzy socks on already but you are my number #1 bff of oils when I roll out my mat. Diffusing you while breathing in and out just adds something extra special to my time on the mat and spraying a bit of a diluted mist on my mat before and after just helps my practice be more purposeful. Thank you for always being by my side to help bring a bit of tranquility to my life. Sincerely, Me!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is the most used oil in our home! With the summer upon us, I add this to my after sun aloe lotion for an extra aid for sunburn. Perfect to help you relax at the end of a stressful day. We also use it in a passive diffuser in the car to help the dog relax as well. Can't be without it!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Teething saver!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This Lavender is fantastic. Amazing quality and the price just cant be beat. I diffuse it every night to help me go to sleep along with Cedarwood. I also made a spray with witch hazel to spray on my pillow at night. I also just sniff it right from the bottle when I want some calm. LOVE Lavendar...probably my favorite oil. I love Plant Therapy more and more with each oil I purchase!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: For diffusing and self-indulgent pampering experiences I prefer French lavender (sold as Lavender Fine here) because it smells much better to my nose. However for synergy blends meant to be used as home remedies (for example a homemade tummy ache blend) this works great and is a wonderful value. This lavender has more of a sugary sweet jammy-lavender scent so you might like this if you enjoy lavender-based desserts and beverages. it's not a bad smell; in fact it does smell very good it just isn't for ME scent-wise.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender and I use it often, so I was excited to get the 30ml bottle of organic lavender. When I opened it, I don't know what is in my bottle but the smell made me want to gag. I can't even describe how bad it Is! I read a lot of good reviews on here so I'm hoping mine was just part of a bad batch. This is my first purchase, along with the peppermint, from this company.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I absolutely love this oil. I had forgotten how pleasant lavender could be. The first time I put this in my diffuser it relaxed me so completely I fell asleep in just a few minutes. I keep this one by my bed now for the times I need a bit of extra help to fall asleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is one of those staple oils that I just always like to have on hand. The smell is just right it eases my kids bug bites calms them at night....we have rollers of this stashed everywhere because it never fails me. Its nice to just order them in a roller makes it easy to just grab and go.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I will admit sniffing this from the bottle is NOT the smell I expected. Once diluted or diffused it became my favorite smelling lavender of all brands of oils I have smelled and used. Very relaxing aroma. I was thankful to have this oil to help with an itchy patch of skin that I had a few nights ago. It took about 15 seconds to feel the relief and the urge to scratch my skin has not come back! They say lavender will be one of you most used oils and I absolutely believe them.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender has definitely been one of the most used oils in our home. Its so multi purposeful! We rub it on our feet at bedtime diffuse it add it to homemade laundry soap and so much more! If you are looking for some good starter oils its definitely one you should consider. The smell is so relaxing!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This roller bottle is a life saver in our household! When our preschooler starts to throw a fit, I just ask her if she would like some lavender and she holds her arms out for me to apply. The scent and the soothing feeling of the roller helps to calm her frazzled emotions. L I F E S A V E R !

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is one of my favorite all purpose oils. I use it mostly to relax although I've heard it has great skin soothing properties. I've read a lot of reviews that this lavendar doesn't smell as good as other brands but I have a pretty sensitive nose and I only find it slightly sharper than other brands. And I personally prefer the sharpness.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Amazing quality!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender for everything. It's one of the safest and you can use it neat on your skin. Usually I put it in the diffuser for sleep, or in the bath with epsom salts. Plant Therapy's is really good. It smells high quality and pure and is a lot more affordable than other oil brands.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have to admit when I first smelt this oil from PT it seemed way too medicinal smelling. I smelt striaght from the bottle but when I mixed it in a carrier or diffused it then the real beauty of the oil came out. I was use to a sweet smelling lavender and or fresh planted lavender not a therupuetic concentration. But I always need this in my collection as I go through this oil so fast.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm new to Plant Therapy. I received my first shipment of oils today (order shipped in 2 days...FREE!). I was especially interested in comparing the lavender I ordered to the many other lavenders that I have. I popped a few drops into my diffuser as soon I the box was opened. This is an amazing oil and it has a richness to the aroma that is hard to describe. I'll be purchasing a larger bottle in the near future.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: A must have for anyone interested in essential oils - so many uses! A lovely and calming scent when diffused - helpful for sleeping on its own or when blended with other grounding and relaxing scents. A no fail of mine is lavender frankincense and peppermint for headaches - this blend really works for me. The scent of this oil is lovely you will not be disappointed =)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is my favourite. I even redecorated my kitchen this month with lavander accesorises and I installed there a little difuser to difuze lavander anytime I want. I am so glad I discovered PT. I also put a few drops of lavander oil in the washing machine whenever I do the laundery so I can catch the aroma in my sheets.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender will always be my top favorite. When smelling this oil tranquility feels the air as if taking a peaceful walk and the breeze hits your senses with quiet beauty. Plant therapy is one of few companies that with every purchase it is counting towards discounted amounts to be used at your leisure. Excellent products.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a tried and true favorite. What else can I say? You can never go wrong with this oil. I use it for just about everything...hair, skin, sleep, and just the simple sweet aroma. I love the fact that I can use it for my allergies instead of taking pills.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I placed my first order with Plant Therapy I stupidly chose a 10 ml bottle of the Lavender Population. I am now going to fix that and order two 30 ml bottles. I adore this oil. I am prone to migraines and scents can really trigger them. This works so well in calming my headaches before they become migraines. I wish I could attach it to my nose. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I enjoy the smell of lavender (a few drops will do the trick) and use it in rollers and in the diffuser. it's a great oil to blend with other oils too. It has been one of the few oils that helps my daughter calm down before bed and help her get to sleep. I like blending it with Frank Carteri and lemon when congested. Lavender is a staple oil in our house!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Worked Perfectly!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a must-have in an essential oil collection. It is versatile and has so many uses. I use lavender in my diffuser at night and I have also used lavender on wool balls for my dryer. Lavender is great in numerous recipes for roller bottles as well! Definitely try it if you haven't before!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was cooking pasta and while stirring I splashed a large amount of boiling water on my stomach I put water on the burn first then I rolled my lavender on it. Later in the day it started burning a bit so I rolled lavender on it again and the burn went away very quickly the burn is 4 days old now and still did not blister it is still very red but no blisters and has decreased in size alot. Plus lavender smells SO good.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If you are a soaper and you are looking for a Lavender EO this is it! After finding out the Lavender we were buying from our trusted source (BB) was rancid (was getting DOS) - we switched to Plant Therapy. This Lavender EO has never disappointed and no more DOS.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: What can't you use lavender for? It's THE most versatile, most used of all my oils. I use it for everything--diffusing, relaxation/sleep, skincare, etc. It's one of the few oils you can use straight on your skin to soften, treat blemishes, etc. I have TMJ and I rub a little of this on my TM joint and jaw muscles before bed. It's also my primary base for diffusing either alone, or mixing with other scents like peppermint, lemon, or eucalyptus. It works beautifully with almost all other scents.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender oil was the first EO I tried and Plant Therapy lavender is one of the best available. Such a pure scent I love it in a spray bottle to spritz my bedding before sleep also just to freshen the air. This lavender oil is one I use very frequently!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Ive never been a huge lavender person but I love PT lavender. I bought it for my husband to diffuse and help him sleep and it has actually helped me sleep so much better as well! I was surprised... since having kids I wake up throughout the night all the time and this is actually help me get some sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I got into EO after making some of my own oil infusions from herbs and other plants. I wanted to enhance what I had made and also use them in making skin care products. I researched many companies and found Plant Therapy to be very highly recommended, pure and safe! They are also affordable!! The lavender has such a beautiful and calming sent! I can't wait to add to my collection!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my most used essential oil to date! it's good for sooooo many things like in beaty creams serum bugbite recovery and yes in my Infinity Diffuser (by itself or mixed with another or more EOs for a blend) to help me relax and sleep! A must EO to always have on hand!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried other brands of lavender eo's and was less than impressed. I even thought I just may not like the scent of lavender. Then on a whim I tried Plant Therapy's lavender. Love at first whiff!! It smells so much more authentic, like a real lavender plant. I use it on my wool dryer balls along with lemon, for a pleasant laundry scent that my whole family loves.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Best sleep!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is amazing. Smells like I'm holding the fresh flowers in my hand. I use this in so many blends and always feel so much peace and relaxation when I use this essential oil. It helps ease my tension. Strongly recommend it for diffusers right before bed time. Its also perfect added to any cleaning or deodorizing mixes, not only for its antibacterial properties but also for the wonderful fragrance.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender drops and a roll on were one of the first EO purchases I made and I an obsessed with them! We diffuse lavender in my daughte's room 30-60 minutes before bedtime most nights and it makes the house smell SO good! I use the roll on regularly for diffusing stress or headaches and it works almost instantly! I also started diluting a few drops with FCO and massaging it into my sore back and knees after exercise and it has helped so much!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love lavender essential oil I used it in a DIY Psoriasis ointment type thing for hubby; (don't know the outcome yet as these things take time) and I use one drop every night with my moisturizer had some extreme dry patches on my eyelids that were rough flaking off and looked ugly adding wrinkles to my eyes but within a week of using the lavender with my moisturizer on my face and around my eyes the flakiness and dry patches are gone. The skin around my eyes looks a lot better and healthier.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my first bottle of lavender from plant therapy and I just used up my other one from another company so I'm just starting to use this! Seems every bit as good as my last one from a very reputable company and I've enjoyed it in a diffuser necklace several times as well as on my son's very stiff neck combination with copaiba. Use it for everything!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Don't know what took me so long to get the 30ml..but i got it! It goes a long way, great for adding to shampoo, facial wash (I use Plant Therapy's Castile Soap), calming my nerves before bed, helps keep my daughte's allergies at bay. It's a wonderful all purpose oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love the natural lavender smell of this oil. There is no chemical or fake lavender smell that you get with many other store bought EOs with this one. I find It's amazing to diffuse in the bedroom at night as it gives me the deepest slumbers and I wake up really refreshed. 5 stars!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I had been using an MLM companys lavender and wanted to compare Plant Therapys. I found PTs lavender to be comparable in quality--I have not noticed a difference when I use it in place of that which I had before--but much more affordable. I will be buying Plant Therapy from here on out with this oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I just don't get a completely authentic vibe from this oil. I have lavender growing in my garden and this oil does not compare. It almost seems diluted... less earthy and more floral. Edens garden on the other hand is spot on with that pungent fresh lavender aroma.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is so amazing. The relaxation properties in it are amazing. I have sleeping issues and this helps me relax and sleep better. This oil is also an excellent go to for burns and has prevented many of my burns from blistering. Highly recommend this oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil was one of my first oils that i used from plant therapy - I had used lavender oil from different brands before and when i got this i was immediately blown away by how good it smelled compared to different brands i had tried before! I use this for everything from sleep support to skincare to hair care to relaxation!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm not a big fan of lavender because of the smell but it has so many uses that I always keep a roller bottle of it on hand for small burns owies or general muscle fatigue. It always seems to help with the pain and discomfort plus it's safe to use on children. I would recommend getting some if you don't have any.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: As someone who does not generally enjoy lavender I have been pleasantly surprised with how much I like this oil. It has a fresh scent that is calming for all in my household! I recommend it to anyone who needs something to diffuse in your home to help everyone unwind at the end of the day.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavendar was the first oil I purchased from PT. I purchased this to compare to other brands needless to say upon first sniff I was hooked. Just bought the 100ml because we go through lavendar so fast. Diffusing for night time owie rollerballs and relaxing baths are our main uses!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried lavender essential oil from other companies and I love Plant Therapy's the best! I currently have it in a reed diffuser in my bathroom and I love the subtle scent every time I walk in or by the room. I have also used it in my skincare and like to add it to unscented lotion.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I absolutely love lavender essential oil! It is one of my favorites! I use it in my diffusers, and put it on topically. This oil is amazing! I have actually reduced skin tags to almost nothing! I'm confident that with continued use I will be able to completely eliminate the skin tags! Besides that, it is very soothing! I will never be without this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender from the bottom of my heart! And i cannot even tell you how many bottles i have gone through however this bottle i received smells so much sweeter...different than my usual lavender. Dont get me wrong I will use it to the very last drop because of its wonderful healing properties...but i am just not a big fan this perticular batch...should i say?

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love using this lavender. I have used alot of different brands of lavender in the past and none compare to the Plant Therapy brand. I love this scent. I diffuse it alone or add a few drops to other oils and it absolutely smells amazing. This is my favorite go to oil of all. I diffuse a couple drops in the bathroom and it smells amazing and so relaxing almost as if I were in a spa. I love the soft fresh aroma of this lavender and I always feel that this oil is a must have in my home.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This was the first time I had ordered lavender from Plant Therapy vs. other brands. I primarily use lavender for my migrane blend with peppermint and frankincense. It was much more of a floral scent compared to other lavenders I have tried in the past. I found it pleasant however my sister found it actually gave her a headache so consider your tolerance of floral scents before purchasing.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Not a fan of the scent

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This smells exactly like the lavender we used at my spa in our towels. This takes me back to tranquil music and quiet afternoons. When I want a really relaxing bath, I mix 2 drops vetiver, 2 drops clary sage, 3 drops lavender. It's the best sleep aid.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Definitely a little overwhelming and not the light scent I was thinking it would be. it's definitely a heavy smell but I'm trying to use it anyways to see how it functions in a blend or in carrier oil. I'd probably purchase a Lavender Fine or Lavadin instead next time.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I cannot live without this Lavender. Every time I place an order I throw a bottle of this on. We use Lavender everyday! I have restless Leg and I make a roller ball and put this on my feet when it starts acting up. We have bottles of this for every diffuser plus I keep it in my diaper bag and purse. We diffuse this during growth spurts so my kids can sleep thru it. I use to hate the smell of Lavender but this one I have no issues with.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I pretty much use lavender with everything. I diffuse it with lots of other oils to different moods of the day. This and peppermint are my favorite and most used oils I get from Plant Therapy. Had to purchase the bigger bottle last round so it would last longer.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Not my favorite but I got it because It's a useful oil. It's so versatile. Got it because I am clumsy and prone to cuts and blisters and lavender in aloe gel is soothing and helps healing. The scent of PT lavender smells better than other lavender products in my opinion. Other products reminds me of artificial air freshener

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love it! I use it for my daughter to help her at night. We use Nighty Night. But just lavender sometimes. I use it with spearmint on bug bites and as a bug repellent. I also use it on my dog as a dog repellent. I also love diffusing it with many other eos. I love lavender and lemon.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Don't know where to start! Lavender has myriad uses! Calming! Helps with sleep. Anti itch if bitten by an insect and great as a body spray for keeping insects away mixed with lemon grass. It helps with sleep. I add a few drops of it with Tea Tree oil to mask the smell of the Tea Tree oil, to my body lotion as I have very dry itchy skin. These are just a few of the uses and Plant Therapy Lavender is great!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I first purchased the organic lavender and was in love! So I thought I would try the regular as well because I go through it so fast. I still like it but I definitely prefer the organic to this one. I didn't think there would be much of a scent difference but there definitely is! In the future I will continue to buy the organic one over this.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Maybe one of the best essential oils. It helps with many thinga - cold, depression, tranquility, sleep. It can be used fornakin and hair care products. Lavender is the most expanded essential oil and every person in the world had used it at least once

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Amazing Deal

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my go to for those pesky burns I seem to get when using my oven. One tiny drop stops the pain. I was attacked by 4 wasps/hornets this summer and was swelling up and my daughter reminded me about lavender and pulled out her bottle. A little amount rammed on each bite and the swelling subsided. Bot daughters use this for that reason for their littles and also diffuse when they are off the walls! My other must have!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've used other brands can't lie but this one is THE best and yes besides the wonderful aroma it works well for me. I use it in blends diffuse it and in inhalers and on my skin in various ways a essential oil which no one should ever ever run out off. I always have a spare ready to go.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have purchased several bottles of lavender from PT and have always been pleased. However, the last bottle smelled off when I opened it. (The best way to describe it is like wet hay.) I contacted customer service, and they immediately sent a new bottle. Unfortunately, it smells the same way. Has the product changed? I will not be purchasing lavender from PT anymore. I really hope I don't start noticing quality issues with the other oils. I really like PT!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is the one oil I don't think I could do without. It's antibacterial qualities and the fact it doesn't need a carrier oil in a pinch make it perfect for all my first aid, household, and self care needs. When I ran out of my last bottle from a different brand my sister gifted me this one and I'm already well in my way to needing the next bottle. My only complaint is the scent wasn't quite what I was used to. Maybe in the past I had oil from a different variety of the plant, who knows. It's still wonderful, just took me a little while to get used to.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love Plant Therapy products! Great Oils that help me in my everyday life. Ever purchase I make I get a thank you from the CEO. What other company does that? They appreciate your business! I will keep using and referring people to this great company!!!! Thanks PT for all you do!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Who doesn't love lavender...it's certainly one of my favorite oils. I use this oil just about every day. I drop a couple of drops on my pillow case at night for help with sleeping and also use it on my neck and temples for helping relieve headaches. Its a wonderful oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is EASILY my most used and most loved essential oil. Out of my 15 essential oils lavender is definitely my go-to. Whether for emotional relief or as a part of my skin routine I love everything about lavender! Time for me to buy another bottle!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Perfect! I hadn't bought many roll ons thinking it is cheaper to make them myself. Finding this on sale at the end of my order a few weeks ago I grabbed it up! I love that I have this in my purse in case of burn bug bite etc! So many ways to use lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have tried a couple of other Lavender EOs and I really enjoyed this one. It is very fragrant. I diffuse my Lavender each night and it really helps me relax and get to sleep. If you're looking for a very good lavender EO I would definitely recommend this one.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've been experimenting on essential oils for deep sleep to calm mind. I found it in lavender eo. 10 drops in my inhaler goes a long way. I also diffuse a few drops at night when I'm having trouble getting myself to sleep. Not only on that, I make myself a blend (with fco) for insect bites, bruises and wounds.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the first time I bought lavender from PT. I think the quality is very good smells very pure. Im used to the lavender from another brand thats why I think ill have to get used to the smell that smells a little different less floral then what Im used to. But that says nothing about the quality. Im excited to start using it
