Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I add this product to a body cream for my massage clients and we all love it! It relaxes them and temporary soothes chronic aches and pains that they are having. I will sometimes add it to the dryer balls for laundry and of course diffuse it in my diffuser when I need some extra love. :pray::skin-tone-2:

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: lavender always reminds me of being in the garden, surrounded by all the plants that I love. I don't like anything too floral as a personal spray and this fits the bill perfectly. I love blending this with either clary sage or a little lemon to lighten it up.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Results are always guaranteed from PT's lavender EO. For me, this is the ness off all EOs. It's calming for mental and physical health. I literally use this oil everyday for so many different things. Body care, bug bites, aches and pains, calming the environment. The list goes in and on.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I can't get enough of this oil! I love lavender and PT's lavender is just wonderful. Of course the scent can vary slightly from batch to batch but my nose hasn't really detected a difference in the many bottles of lavender I've purchased from PT over the years. This oil is great for burns--including sunburns--and works great for sleep for my family. I also like to put lavender and tea tree in my laundry.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I recently decided to experiment with essential oils. I purchased about 20 different kinds of oil to make my own blends. I was surprised how versitle lavendar was. Had to get a refill soon after. Among other uses I put lavendar on my wool dryer balls for bedding...especially for our guest room. Love the soft gentle fragerance and it really helps to calm the mind.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender was my first oil purchase. I bought it with a specific purpose in mind, but quickly found endless uses for this oil. I wouldn't consider myself a floral scent loving person, but I fell in love with lavender. Next time I will most likely purchase the largest bottle available because I use this oil often. Lavender is definitely a must-have oil for anyone!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender has long reigned as the queen of essential oils and with good reason. I find Plant Therapy provides the right balance between price and quality for this ubiquitous oil. I use it in everything from pillow spray to sunburn mix to dry skin balm to nasal rinse. If Plant Therapy offered a lavender deodorant I would get that too.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Relaxing...Works

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this oil. First of all it's kid safe and safe for use on chickens!! Second, I appreciate that it pairs great with lemon for diffusing! Adding peppermint with those two said oils and you have a blend to fight allergies. Love it! It's a great price too for an oil comparable to those MLM lavenders for a portion of the price!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is in every room of my house. The smell is so pleasant and relaxing. I always stay stocked up! Every time the kids bathe I add it to the water, i add to laundry balls in the dryer, I use it for skin care which it is AMAZING for, etc. my all time favorite oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender! it's great to put in the diffuser for a relaxing evening and helps prep me for a great night of sleep. I also use it in my homemade lotion for a great refreshing smell. I use it on my woozie balls in the dryer to give the clothes a nice scent as well.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am personally not a fan of lavender. My kids however cant or wont rather sleep without it. They fight every night against sleep. 1 drop of lavender on the under side of their pillow case and 10 mins later...boom..out like a light. I can see the need for a subscription on this one.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I was first introduced to oils a few years ago, I was so blown away by so many oils. Lavender was not one of them. I wasn't a big fan of the smell and I just thought what a basic oil... but the more I learned about essential oils and began making my own blends the more I noticed that Lavender is used a lot! I mean it's become a thing... anything that ails my family I say, I bet I've got an oil for that. And so much of the time I could just say, I bet Lavender will help with that. And almost everytime I look something up, it's TRUE! Lavender is such an Essential oil to have in your collection. It is so Essential and yes basic but that's because basically all your oil lovers out there know it's just so basically essential.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The smell is amazing. I love to blend it with lemon and peppermint for allergies. We diffuse it for relaxation. I put it in my did toner and even use it in a bum spray. My husband loves the smell so much he rubs a little in his beard and mustache. So many uses.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I tend to be back and forth about if I like lavender. It is definitely calming and relaxing, a bit strong though. If you like lavender on its own then this is perfect for you. I might try using one drop in my diffuser along with another oil to balance it out

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I started using this when my 10 year old daughter got a part in the musical Sound of Music. They had GRUELING practices from 6-10 or 11 pm every night. She ALWAYS gets sick when she gets run down. She still had to be up everyday for school at 7 so she was running on a major sleep deficit for about 2 months. It was my full time job to keep her healthy so she didnt miss any practices. She not only did not get sick once but no sore throat no cough no nothing. I honestly owe it all to this. Lifesaver!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: When I first started using EO I wasn't sure if I liked lavender but I know it has a lot usefully qualities so I gave it a try. it's growing on me. Has a strong powerful smell and only a very small amt is needed. Has calming effects and seems to help headaches. The kids like when I diffuse it a night before bed it helps to wind everyone down.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Soothing!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is so useful for many things. If you are just starting out with oils this is one you need to get. You can just tell when you open the bottle that is 100% pure oil. There is a huge difference the retail oils that are becoming papular in stores. This bottle is the same price but pure and non synthetic. You just can't beat Plant Therapy.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this oil. It!!! It has been a life saver in my house. We rescued a boxer-mix puppy two years ago and found out that he had severe separation anxiety (jumping thru screens to get out when we left the house chewing the back door in an attempt to escape and a plethora of other adventures). We were at our wits end when I decided to try EOs. Began diffusing lavender daily and applying it directly on him before we would leave the house. Much improvement!!! Love love love this oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Let me start by saying that I had previously ordered a 30-ml bottle of Organic lavender essential oil from Plant Therapy and have been very happy with it. This time I wanted to get the same oil only in a smaller size to be able to carry it in my purse. When I saw that Plant Therapy was having a sale on lavender essential oils I ordered this one right away without realizing that this was NOT organic lavender essential oil. When it arrived I simply put it in my purse without testing it because I assumed it was the same oil that I already had at home. However when it came time to use it I noticed that the oils scent was very odd. It had a hint of bitterness in it and just didnt smell right. I thought this was a bit strange but didnt give it too much thought because I was in a hurry. The next time I reached for the bottle I noticed the same odd smell. This time I examined the bottle to make sure it was lavender oil and discovered to my dismay that this oil was not organic. I realized that I must have somehow overlooked this detail at the time of purchase. Still knowing that it came from Plant Therapy whose products I like and trust I decided to give this oil another chance so I tried it on yet another occasion. Unfortunately the bitterness was still present and it overpowered the scent that one normally associates with lavender. I dont know if it has to do with the type of lavender flowers collected for this oil or the distillation process but this oil in my opinion is inferior to the organic lavender oil sold by Plant Therapy. I would not recommend this oil for therapeutic use. I am very disappointed because now it is too late to return the product and I still need to buy a replacement organic lavender oil in a small bottle.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm in the process of switching from another oil brand, and I heard about Plant Therapy. I had my doubts because the prices were amazing, but every oil I have tried has been amazing! The lavendar is a great quality and smells so good! Plus, I love that I can buy big bottles because it is my go-to oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Just purchased lavender oil for the first-time and absolutely love it! It has such a gentle pleasant sweet and herbal scent. Have not been using long enough to notice effects on skin however when I place a few drops on a cotton ball and place by my pillow I have had much more rested sleep. No tossing and turning and waking up in the night. Love this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender has always been one of my favorite scents but as I keep digging into the EO culture I'm quickly learning that it works for EVERYTHING! I ended up buying the 100ml bottle because we went thru the 30ml so quickly! We diffuse it to rest use it on irritated skin hair and scalp and in homemade rollerballs. Its my holy grail oil!!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've always love the smell of lavender. Now I know what I can use it for. I've added it to my existing lotion for my skin. My hands stay super dry in the winter. The lavender helps calm the redness down and makes the skin burn less when I put the lotion on. Also use it as a roll-on for my daughters feet before bed. When she gets more teeth I plan on using it as a teething remedy. I also use it just to diffuse at night. I like that the smell last long with just a small amount. Other oils I bought that needed to have lots in the diffuser to smell for a long time. I only use two drops with this and smell it all night.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I don't have a hard time falling asleep. I have a hard time getting back to sleep once I get up to go to the bathroom. I decided instead of taking Melatonin every night I would alternate the Melatonin with Lavender Essential Oil. All I can say is I love it! This purchase has helped me to decide that from now on I am going to try Essential Oils instead of taking pills for any problems I may have. It appears that Plant Therapy has an oil for everything! I suggest buying a small bottle of Lavender in case it doesn't work for you then you didn't spend too much. I will be purchasing a bigger bottle of Lavender in the near future!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My husband has a difficult time breathing at night. He uses a c-pap machine and even though that helps he was still getting very stopped up. I started combining Respir Aid Relax and lavender and it has made all the difference in the world! Now he sleeps peacefully every night and is not stopped up at all! Love my Plant Therapy Essential Oils!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender love

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Our family uses a lot of lavender. It's our go-to oil. I love diffusing it with some frankincense or cedarwood to fall asleep. It's also effective mixed with lotion and applied to stop restless legs. Plant therapy is great with quick delivery times and free shipping.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm so glad I stopped diluting my 10mL Lavender essential oil myself and just went ahead and got the roll-on! Now I can leave my undiluted bottle for diffusing and take lavender with me for minor skin irritations and soothing mid-day migraines wherever I go!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is truly a great EO. I've purchased other lavender EO and this one has a true floral smell. Some I've purchased have a almost synthetic smell to them but when I open the bottle it reminded me of smelling a bouque of lavender stalks. Beautifully fragrant and not overpowering or stinging.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I actually found Plant Therapy because I was shopping for lavender oil and wanted to find a better price than I'd previously been paying. I ordered this along with 3 other oils. This was the only one I didn't love! It smelled weaker and sweeter than the lavender I'm used to. I emailed PT and they quickly issued a refund. 5-star customer service!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I continue to be amazed that Lavender Essential Oil can do all it does. The calming effect when used in aromatherapy is amazing. I let the scent in my area calm me soothe the emotions that seemingly are destroying the good day and then I realize the reason is the Lavender Oil in my diffuser. I was never a big believer in that before-back just a few years ago-but when you allow the aroma diffuser to do its thing you can better do yours. Then there is the assistance to easing the pain in my knees. I have arthritis and it can stop you cold but with the aroma therapy and application to my knees well I get back into the mainstream. You too can find it because Lavender has that effect on just about all who use it.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of our top oils in our house and we have tried several different brands. And I have to say I prefer the dollar tree one over this. This one smells so fake and gross. It's definitely a disappointment compared to all of plant therapy's other great oils. Hopefully I just got a bad bottle.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of my favorite oils for so many reasons! It's calming for our family and I diffuse around bedtime for my little ones. I use it on dryer balls in the laundry since we don't use dryer sheets / chemicals. Our clothes always smell so nice and comforting. There are so many more ways to use lavender and I love how versatile it is!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is my go to scent. I carry some in my purse, keep some in my office and of course have it at home. I use it in the passive diffuser at my desk, It's my husband's favorite for bedtime. We rub some on our pillows and the edge of the sheets. I also mix it with lemon and peppermint for stuffy nose and headache relief. So many uses!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Anytime I'm running low on lavender, I have to re-stock with another bottle from PT. I got the 30ml size this time because I use lavender oil for everything - between dryer balls, diffusing, DIY, and skin care. This is a well rounded oil with so many uses!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Sleeping like a baby

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my first purchase of lavender essential oil from Plant Therapy so I don't have anything to compare it to other than previous brands I've used before. This does not smell like any lavender EO I've ever used. It smells more like chamomile EO with a hint of lavender. I'm assuming this is normally not the case since there are several positive reviews so I'm wondering if I just got a bad batch or the bottle was possibly mislabeled.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I don't know why anyone would spend major amounts of money on MLM oil when these oils are of superior or equal quality. I can't tell a difference in my MLM oil and this oil. I am so happy to have found Plant Therapy. This lavender is amazing for sleep and relaxation. Also soothing dry skin.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love using this oil!!! Whether I'm trying to wind down after a long day or need a little help getting my baby to sleep, it never let's me down. My 7 month old sometimes has trouble falling asleep at night. I dab a little of this on his chest and he's out like a light. It's a regular staple in my house. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the third bottle of lavender oil I've tried ordering from here (after the first bottle, which smelled perfect and lovely) that doesn't smell right. It's better than the last two, but there's still an undertone of some scent that is very unpleasant. I tried doing a return (filled out the form) on the last bottle, but never heard from anybody. All the other oils I've purchased from here are great, so I will continue to order them, but I will be buying my lavender from somewhere else from now on.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've ordered PT Lavender over & over again. It just smells like pure, lovely lavender. And you can't beat the price! I put on dryer wool balls for every load, put on my "passive" diffuser at work and use in my bedroom diffuser. LOVE IT!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender oil for so many different things. It's my favorite oil since it is so versatile. It's stong but not overpowering. Just perfect! I use it in my homemade psoriasis balm, in drawer sachets, in my diffuser necklace, and homemade carpet freshener.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm a massage therapist I used this during my sessions and my client love it. I can really smell the scent. Other oils I've tried the scent doesn't last or you can barely smell it. So far I've received do many compliments my clients feel more relaxed and I've had clients add on aromatherapy to their sessions more now

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is one of my favorite oils! We diffuse in our bedrooms to help us sleep and also put a few drops mixed in unscented body lotion or a carrier oil. It is gentle enough to use on my toddler in a blend with a carrier oil or a little lotion to help relax her at bedtime. There are so many uses for this oil!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: It came up as an add on deal and I didn't have any Lavender yet so I figured why not? I am so glad I did and will definitely reorder it when the time comes. I just whip it out when needed and apply it to my sons 5 and 2. We drive into town once a week and I bring it with me if the boys start slipping into less of a self-controled state I rub some on their wrists. Whether a placebo or not it helps them and they like it.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love Lavender

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender oil is an absolute staple in my home. From adding it to the laundry (no dryer sheets ever), to diffusing it with Cedarwood & sweet orange for restful night, this one is a must have. I also use it in balms, lotions, or diluted to give my skin the benefits of the oil, which seems to help breakouts & minor blemishes. I had previously been using another huge brand, and decided to give Plant Therapy a go after a recommendation from a trusted friend, & my own (week long) searching of all the company's ins & outs. My only qualm about this lavender is that is doesn't smell... the same, as my previous bottle. Almost like a musty version of what I'm used to. I can honestly say that, while I like it, I don't love it. I will, however, continue to use it, and will purchase again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Clearly lavender essential oil is one that everyone knows about. However theres something special about plant therapys lavender. I have had to up grade from the 10ml to 30ml and its been so nice to not have to worry about running out. Especially right now with transition with my kids. Both are special needs and both ask for lavender rubs and lavender baths and when we go out they ask for their smelly goods the personal inhalers. Lavender is just such a great oil and im thankful to not have to worry about what in any plany therapy bottle. For a mom who also loves oils that isnt even a thought since finding plant therapy

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love is an understatment. This coming from somone that used to toss and turn all night. I was so deserate to find the end all to me restlessness and I can safely say finding this was like finding gold. I use this mixed with witch hazel and spray pillow a half hour before I lay down for sleep. WOW its such a great invention

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this oil! Lavender is hands down the most used oil in our home. From relaxation to bruises to teething babes to hives! Being kid safe makes it even more versatile. I also love the fragrance. It's wonderful on its own or diffused with other oils such as bergamot.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: at first i didn't really like the smell of lavender. It has an off smell to it. but my wife uses it for our laundry, and our clothes comes out smelling pretty good. Not too bad. It also has great benefits to using this oil, so we keep it stocked up all the time. Just ran out... need more.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have been using a mlm company doterra. well lets just say I'm going to start buying my oils from plant therapy. This oil smells just like the lavender from doterra and the quality is just as good if not better. For the price of this oil is a steal! I am so glad I found plant therapy and so does my wallet!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: If I had to choose one essential oil to have, this would be it. Lavender for me is a must! First, if I have any kind of skin issue...guess what I use? Lavender! It's great for all types of burns, insect bites, irritations, rashes, etc....pretty much any skin issue I have, I first go to lavender. Second, it is very safe and blends so well with many other oils. I use it in my diffuser all the time (often blended with lemon or peppermint or both)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is the best one I have found so far. I put a drop on my pillow and also use it in my diffuser an hour before I go to bed. It really works. It relaxes you and help you fall asleep. Thank you Plant Therapy for providing free shipping as well. Happy customer!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love Lavendar ! Myself and my husband love it to help us sleep and I add it to my face cream whenever I feel my skin needs an extra bit of TLC. As Lavendar was one of the few oils I had any experience with as I'm new to oils I knew PT was the way to go once I got this one. Much better than the MLM one I'd spent way too much money !!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this oil! It is so versatile, it can be used as itself or combined to other oils. I'm going to mix it with lemon and give that a try for something different. I diffuse this at night and it really helps to relax you and help with sleep. Highly recommended! Lavender oil should be a staple in every one's oil collection.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I'm going to need to order the big bottle next time because I use lavender for SO many things. It's one of those super versatile oils that blends well with others and for me is a must-have. I use it twice a day by mixing a few drops with hyaluronic acid and applying to clean skin to control sebum production. My makeup has NEVER looked so fresh for 8 - 12 hrs at a time! I also use lavender in a makeup setting spray I make as well as ointments face cream diffusing etc. It's just an amazing oil and Plant Therapy has a great quality lavender for an even greater price. You will not be disappointed!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Like the ease of the roller bottles. I'm thankful that plant therapy includes the dilution info and I plan to refill wit my own when it's empty. So it will be nice to have the label. I'm not a super huge fan of lavender but I've been pleased with PT's. it's a very useful oilThis roller bottle has come in handy while my infant is teething. And bonus that I got it as a reduced add on.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love the calming scent of Plant Therapy's Lavender essential oil. I always keep a bottle or two on hand. It helps out with my pollen allergies by allowing me to breathe better too! I also add it to my fragrance free body lotion and use to moisturize my skin.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought the Lavender roll on blend as an add on purchase during the 25 Days of Christmas. I love lavender for so many reasons but mostly skin care and to help me sleep. I use the roll on at night right before bed and it helps me to relax and fall asleep faster.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a lovely oil and can be used in so many ways to enjoy its aroma as well as in a number of therapeutic applications. In my opinion there is no aromatherapy without Lavender. It calms the mind and soothes the skin. Plant Therapy sells high quality Lavender at affordable price.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love this Lavender oil. It relaxes me and helps me go to sleep and calms my nerves. This is my favorite oil. I place it on my pillows at bed time and along the edge of my top sheet. I add it to non-scented lotion and then use it on my hands, neck and feet. This oil also helps with my allergies.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I tend to be back and forth about if I like lavender. It is definitely calming and relaxing, a bit strong though. If you like lavender on its own then this is perfect for you. I might try using one drop in my diffuser along with another oil to balance it out

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a must-have in an essential oil collection. It is versatile and has so many uses. I use lavender in my diffuser at night and I have also used lavender on wool balls for my dryer. Lavender is great in numerous recipes for roller bottles as well! Definitely try it if you haven't before!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Comforting and relaxing

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The smell is very relaxing and instantly calms me down, the smell is very weak if I use it in my oil diffuser, so I just started carrying it around with me to smell, and I found that it reduces my stress and anxiety by a large margin. I also use it to do laundry and found a noticeable better smell in my sheets and clothes.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: The lavender was a little sweeter smelling than I'm used to at first sniff from the bottle. However when diffused or topically applied with coconut oil it smelled better. I mix this with everything and often will use by itself. Lavender is definitely my go to oil.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a must have oil for everything! It's 100% pure! I use it for skin care, my diffuser! I have used it in my hair for months and months! I don't wash my hair with generic shampoo, I make a blend with this oil and have seen awesome results for healthy hair!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have gotten lavender from various other companies but I must say I am hooked on plant Therapy's lavender! We use it for so many different reasons... diffusing laundry soap bath bombs shower gels etc and have found this to be most affordable and pure. Thanks plant therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is awesome! I just got the bigger size because I was going through the 10ml size pretty fast. Since lavender is in a lot of my recipies I go through it quickly. I've used different brands of essential oils and Plant therapy is far and away my first choice.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is the fourth time I've bought lavender from Plant Therapy and I've never been disappointed. I finally gave in and got the big size because I use it daily on my family. Thank you Plant Therapy for providing a great product and for not being a MLM company!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is the greatest oil in the world! Use it every night to help me sleep. My kids love it too. Plant therapy lavender is fantastic. I've smelled Young living lavender and you can't tell the difference except your wallet can tell the difference.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: My products always arrive in a very timely manner and are always what I would expect. Ive never received a product from PT that was less than expected. And their prices just simple cannot be beat. If you havent tried PT do it now you willnot regret it. They are definitely my go to for all my EOs.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender oil! I diffuse it almost every night and make sleep rollers with it for all my friends and family. I also love the fast shipping. It was awesome to get my lavender oil in just 2 days after I realized my original bottle was all out. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: finally, REAL lavender!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I received a tip from a friend to use lavender for dry hands/chapped lips. In the winter I really struggle with this as we constantly have heating going in the house. I used the roll on for this and it was amazing from the first moment I used it. Apart from a lovely fragrance my hands and lips haven't felt this great in months!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: It has many good qualities, not just its calming property, but I love to use it when I have a migraine, usually by diffusing it. This pack is really cost-efficient. I pour some in a smaller bottle and use the oil from there, so I should not open the big bottle everytime I want to use it, avoiding its evaporation.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This essential oil is a must have for me. Anything from diffusing it and rubbing a bit under my nose to fall asleep, to applying onto blemishes, to calming babies down, it helps for so many things! Love how strong and pure this essential oil is. Thanks for a great, trust worthy product!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I used Plant Therapy's Lavender in comparison with one of the big companies promoting oils right now for almost 3 times the price and they were the same. Why spend all that money when Plant Therapy is just as good if not better?! Love Plant Therapy products!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am very sensitive to artificial floral scents and have had bad experiences with lavender candles and sprays. I cautiously decided to try this E/O and was so pleasantly surprised! I love it! It smells like fresh lavender and not perfumy at all. Best of all it doesn't bother my allergies!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I've reorder lavender about a million times at this point!it's a staple in our household in every way. Some of my favorite ways to use it are: adding a few drops to epsom salt baths making homemade body scrubs diffusing at night before bed to calm the mind and a million other ways.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: While I personally don't like the smell of lavender mostly everyone else does, and it has so many good uses and is a staple in many oil kits. Great for sleep or soothing skin when mixed with a carrier oil. My personal favorite roller with lavender is peppermint, lavender, tea tree and blue tansy as a mosquito bite roller to remove the itch and soothe the skin.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is our most used oil that I am constantly reordering. Just this last time I went to use it and thought what HOW is it out already?! It can be used for SO MUCH! My daughter has sensitive skin so when she wants to scent her slime she makes she also uses this with no irritation. :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender so much I bought the 100ml bottle! It's so great and smells so good! I use it at bedtime with cedarwood in my diffuser! I also use it for hair growth spray! It is just as hood if not better than the mlm brands if you're a skeptic! :slightly_smiling:

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Smells different

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Always have a lavender on hand. So diverse as it mixes well with many other favorites. Especially like it with citrus scents such as orange and lemon. Also is wonderful with sleep induced oils for a calling rest night. Try it with bergamot and chamomile.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender has a great scent! I really loved the idea of using essential oils. I am glad found a local (from my hometown! Go Twin Falls!) company that provides what I need without the promises of curing cancer or making claims they can not prove. I got a starter kit last year for Christmas and have been slowly building my collection. I have found plant therapy to be high quality works great and smell great .

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender oil...one of the main reasons I searched out Plant Therapy for oils. This helps in so many ways. Relieves stress calms the senses and honestly decreased my headaches since switching out other room deodorizing products. I would highly recommend. It smells so good.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use Lavendar oil in the diffuser at night. I am getting a good nights sleep at least 75% of the time. My deep sleep has increased according to my fitness tracker. I feel relaxed and breathe better at night; even during allergy season. High quality product.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender for many things but this purchase was to use with copaiba. I then use a few drops for my wool dryer balls. The smell on the clothes is very soft yet snuggly on the sheets and blankets. The blend is 30 drops of lavender and 20 drops of the copaiba. Plant Therapy products are high quality at great prices.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Whether using in a diffuser spritzing it (diluted with distilled water) to freshen my linen closet or my bed in the morning or making a sugar scrub the lavender essential oil is versatile affordable and of high quality. Fast shipping. Extremely reasonable prices. Im a long-time buyer and user of Plant Therapy Essential Oils and have introduced many of my friends to Plant Therapy.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am thrilled that I have finally found a lavender blend to help with restless and sleepless nights. I put a few drops in a diffuser a drop on my pillow on the bottom of my feet and I am asleep until my alarm clock goes off. I have this blend on autoship every 2 months! So in love. Amazing smell to fit the amazing price!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use this for everything- burns. sores. in homemade salves and use to diffuse with other scents. I make a homemade soap similar to Defend soap which uses Eucalyptus and Tea Tree oil but I add some lavender to help keep it from smelling so medicinal. All 3 oils are a great help to any skin ailments. I love this stuff.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was hoping to really like the smell of lavender. It's not bad, but it has an off smell to it. I can't describe it. It's not a bad smell overall, just not what I was expecting. This is my first Lavender from PT and the price is good. This oils is good for everything, so I can get pass the smell.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender essential oil

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my first bottle of PT lavender. I had one that was gifted to me from another company. Wow what a difference! I have only used PT oils but who would turn down a gift...PT has never let me down and the lavender smells sooo much better. I love it!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I personally don't like the smell of lavender by itself but it blends so well with so many other scents that it is a must have IMO. My personal favorite blend right now with my kiddos all being congested is lavender with eucalyptus dives! SMELLS AMAZING! Do yourself a favor and buy a couple bottles of Lavendar because you will go through it fast!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought this oil because I use lavender on my face. This oil has a chemical smell that does not smell like DoTerra s lavender oil. I used it on my face and had to immediately wash it off. I will not be buying this lavender oil again. The odd smellmakes me question other oils.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have all 3 versions of the lavender. That seems redundant but each one is unique. The lavandin may start out strong and perky then a very sweet scent lingers lingers for a long time. It helps me with mild headaches, congestion and pains. Its great in refreshing closets because the scent lasts a while.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use Lavender Essential Oil daily I used to not like the smell of lavender till I found this good quality authentic lavender with NO synthetics added. I diffuse it at night mixed with Peppermint Essential Oil and I add about 10 drops of Lavender with 3 drops of Peppermint to an epsom salt bath I also add both to my granddaughters stuffed animal she sleeps with

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have chronic dibilatating migraines and I use the lavender in a roller ball mixed with peppermint eo to rub on my forehead and temples. It's very soothing and distracts me from the pain. I also add a few drops of lavender to Epsom salts when taking a bath to help me unwind and get my mind and body ready for sleep.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender oil every day. I add a few drops of lavender to wool dryer balls to make my laundry smell so good. I put it on mosquito bites to help take away the itch. I diffuse it for a calming scent at night. Can't say enough good things about it!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I cant say enough about this wonderful synergy blend. I started using this last year before fall began and diffused it on a daily basis through winter. The results were amazing as this is the first year ever that no one in our house was sick. No flu...no cold...no sinus problems! I decided that this is a staple in our home and I now diffuse it year round just maybe not daily as I was doing through the fall and winter season.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a lovely-smelling, calming oil. It smells sweet. When I combine this oil with vanilla oleoresin and cedar wood atlas, my son can't keep his eyes open at bedtime! :joy: Love this oil. I also like to diffuse it with vanilla or even lemon to make my house smell nice.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: MOST VERSATILE ESSENTIAL OIL

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am thrilled that I have finally found a lavender blend to help with restless and sleepless nights. I put a few drops in a diffuser a drop on my pillow on the bottom of my feet and I am asleep until my alarm clock goes off. I have this blend on autoship every 2 months! So in love. Amazing smell to fit the amazing price!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I had been using a lavender from another company and although it smelled fine, it wasn't until I used Plant Therapy that I realized how superior this company's lavender was to the other with regards to therapeutic benefits. The othe lavender never helped me relax but this one actually helped me fall asleep within minutes! All of my oils are from Plant Therapy now. Best quality, scent and the only company I trust!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am new to the Plant Therapy family (previously used other brands) and just received my first order one of the oils being Lavender. Boy I am happy I ordered this one! Such a beautiful and pure aroma! Plant Therapy has high quality products for sure. Will definitely be ordering again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use Lavendar oil in the diffuser at night. I am getting a good nights sleep at least 75% of the time. My deep sleep has increased according to my fitness tracker. I feel relaxed and breathe better at night; even during allergy season. High quality product.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I always have this on hand. I have tried others brands but this one is better in quality and aroma. I use for sleep blends face/body products cleaning products room spray rollers inhalers etc. My next DIY projects are a Stretch Marks body butter and some bath bombs with a few lavander buds. TY PT

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Hands down my favorite lavender oil! Plant Therapy not only has a therapeutic grade lavender oil, but they sell it for such a incredibly low price. I put the lavender oil in our Epson salts, and we use Epson salt baths to treat anxiety in my house and achy muscles. It's awesome!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Always have a lavender on hand. So diverse as it mixes well with many other favorites. Especially like it with citrus scents such as orange and lemon. Also is wonderful with sleep induced oils for a calling rest night. Try it with bergamot and chamomile.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I diffuse a couple drops along with Cedarwood Clary Sage and Tangerine (or Bergamot) every night and I also use it extensively in homemade skincare products. Plant Therapy Lavender has a mild pleasant scent. Used along with Frankincense a scar from a burn I got is now barely visible.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We love using this oil. I use it with my kids as well as the adults in the house. It is great to put in the diffuser. We bought it in preparation for our labor with our second kiddo. I've also used it in bath bombs for our oldest child. Would purchase again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Cant say enough!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I buy all my essential oils from Plant Therapy and recommend it to my friends. I use a lot of lavender in my laundry and my diy sprays for calmness. I also use it in my diy shower sugar scrub for nighttime showers and the lemon for morning showers - use a mint mxture for my grand-daughte's sugar scrubs. The oils smell the bet of any I have ever bought!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I know oils vary by region grown and how they are extracted so it is likely personal preference but I dont really care for the scent of this. It isn't quite Lavender-y to me. I have heard Lavender Flowers C02 (an OOTM) may be a better choice I wish it would become permanent. I plan to try Lavender Fine to see if I like that better. This one was just okay I don't really use it because the scent isn't pleasant to me.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have found lavender to be the most beneficial oil. When you need a little calming down in order to sleep, a little behind the ears or on the neck, on a cotton ball slipped into the pillow case or diffused in the bedroom is great. Also can be used on mild burns.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: First off let me just say I've been ordering from only MLM companies and paying very high prices. I was always told to believe that low prices meant low quality. I decided I would give Plant Therapy a try despite my extreme skepticism. SO GLAD I DID. This lavender is just as good if not better! I could immediately tell it was high quality as soon as I opened the bottle. My kids and I used it last night to achieve a good nights sleep and works like a charm. Cannot say enough good things about this product :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have purchased Lavender from other essential oil companies and does not smell as good as Plant Therapy's Lavender. It seems so pure. it's what you imagine lavender to smell like - what the actual plant smells like. it's very soothing. I use it in all of my blends.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is one of my favorite all-around oils. It's great for everything - sleep, pain, colds, rashes, skincare, anxiety, depression, perfumery... It's like the Swiss Army knife of oils! Lavender is definitely an oil worth subscribing to - I use it almost daily!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a new favorite of mine. I've loved plant therapy for years but just recently I have been buying the pre-diluted roll ons. The smell of this is divine and very relaxing. I roll it on my upper shoulders after a tense day at work and it relaxes my muscles :)

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my go to oil for just about everything. I carry it with me when I need some stress relieve, especially at work. Its a great bed time oil, too. This is the best quality lavender I've found so far, and I've tried alot. It smells fresh and clean.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is definitely my most diffused oil. Though it smells amazing by itself I like to diffuse it along with some oils that I feel are too strong or too earthy for my liking it helps to dilute the smell and make it more tolerable. I will always keep this one in stock!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Great versatile oil

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I used to wonder why everyone liked things scented with lavender. I couldn't stand it as it always made the back of my throat hurt. Now I think I know why. I must have been smelling synthetic lavender because this is lovely fresh and soothing. Now I understand what everyone was talking about! Great product at a great price!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use this in my difusser during the day when Im gone for my dogs. I THINK they like it? :) My puppy has had separation anxiety and think that this may help with that. I have used it at night when I go to bed and it helps me relax. I just LOVE walking into my bedroom and taking a deep breath in. So calming...

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I got this oil in an "essential oil set" that came at hand when I first started with essential oils. I can't say I love the scent, but the benefits of it are amazing. I keep on hearing it's good for allergies when used with lemon and peppermint, but never got the chance to actually try it because Saint God, I don't suffer from any allergies ...but it happened to find myself in too much dust and then my nose started to pour....and pour...and I applied peppermint, lemon and lavender on my nostrils, the back of my neck, and on the forehead and almost instantly the symptoms were gone. I couldn't believe, but wow, it works! So never mind the smell if it's doing the joB! It's also good for minor burns if applied undiluted.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is by far my favorite! Lavender mixes well with so many of my other favorite oils or it's great on it's own. The lavender oil creates a calming mood wherever I diffuse it, my bedroom or my living room while I work. I used it so much that I had to buy the bigger bottle!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender and hope one day to buy this in organic and fine and whatever other types there are. I love diffusing it and using it in an inhaler or roller. I love it plain. It has a specialness to it I can't explain. When blends have lavender, I usually buy it. You can't go wrong with PT lavender- great price and value on top of all the other benefits PT offers.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a must have for all EO users from the beginner to the experience. It is has unlimited uses with a soothing and relaxing fragrance. It's worth the investment to buy the largest bottle you can, because it gets used A LOT!! We use it for any kind of itches, diffuse for releasing stress from a busy day, or in a soothing hot bath.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I was suckered into young living mlm but couldnt keep up with the expensive prices. I did some research and found plant therapy. I get double the amount of great quality oil for half the price AND free shipping (note that I also get a discount from yl and plant therapy still beat that price). I love diffusing oils in my home and would like to start making some of my own natural product. Plant therapy makes that possible! I also love how fast my item shipped!!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have always been a big fan of lavender essential oils but I recently ran out of my last one from another company and decided to buy it from my favorite place ever Plant Therapy and I wish I would have ordered it sooner. It is way better than any lavender I have ever smelled and it blends so well with so many of my favorite oils.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I had given about 30 drops to my friend to try in her diffuser to help her child with falling asleep at night. The Plant Therapy lavender worked wonders. After she ran out she went to the store and found a different brand. She found that brand didn't smell as good or strong. So to always try to encourage people to use quality essential oils (and not ones that are fragrance oils) I bought a bottle for her. And this is the only lavender that I've been using for at least 5 years because I too think it has a wonderful smell and I know it works wonders!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Something Off?

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am new to the Plant Therapy family (previously used other brands) and just received my first order one of the oils being Lavender. Boy I am happy I ordered this one! Such a beautiful and pure aroma! Plant Therapy has high quality products for sure. Will definitely be ordering again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have been so excited to have discovered Plant Therapy! I have previously ordered a different, more expensive brand. I love that the cost is cheaper but the quality isn't! Lavender is my favorite oil and I would highly recommend purchasing it from Plant Therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Top quality for an awesome price! All the certifications are incredibly reassuring too! I feel like I sleep 10x's better when I add a few drops to my diffuser every night. We even use the *kidsafe Lavender for our daughter - especially when we travel.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is honestly great like other people have said due to its many uses. I have diffused it and I have applied it to bug bites. The bug bites left much quicker than normal and didn't itch! However I will say be careful how much you put in a diffuser because it can be very strong! I put the same amount I had used for my tangerine oil and it was super strong! Overall a great oil and a great price too.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender and I love plant therapy so I decided to try this oil. Unfortunately I don't like the way this lavender smells. I still feel that it is relaxing and that I am getting all the benefits from it so hence the 4 star review. But I am just not pleased with the aroma.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Like most EO enthusiasts, lavender is probably the most important oil that we all have and use most regularly. I have purchased many bottles from PT and also have at least one type of lavender from 5 other reputable EO companies. They are all similar, but each one has it's own 'je ne sais quoi'. But this last batch of 30ml lavender from PT that I got is absolutely divine. It is probably the best smelling lavender of any company I have tried over the years, including all the past PT bottles i've gone through. CS confirmed it was a new batch and if you aren't sure you even need a new lavender, I recommend you get a bottle right now so you can experience this beautiful batch. It is less herbaceous and more sweet, more of the lavender fine or lavender diva scent profile. Floral and intoxicating. Anyways, I am obsessed and just bought another 30ml bottle so it will last (a little) longer!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is a must have for all EO users from the beginner to the experience. It is has unlimited uses with a soothing and relaxing fragrance. It's worth the investment to buy the largest bottle you can, because it gets used A LOT!! We use it for any kind of itches, diffuse for releasing stress from a busy day, or in a soothing hot bath.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This oil is by far my favorite! Lavender mixes well with so many of my other favorite oils or it's great on it's own. The lavender oil creates a calming mood wherever I diffuse it, my bedroom or my living room while I work. I used it so much that I had to buy the bigger bottle!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my favorite oil in my collection because of how versatile it is. I put this in a roller and it is great for healing of cuts burns bug bites etc. It has such an amazing calming smell that it is also my favorite oil to diffuse. Perfect for bedtime alone or even with Eucalyptus if you are trying to ward off a cough. Highly recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love it

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Steam-distilled flowering tops with a medium-strength aromatic scent that is sweet dry and herbaceous-floral lavender essential oil indeed blends well with Bergamot Cedarwood Virginian Clove Bud Clary Sage Geranium Egyptian Helichrysum Italicum Lemon Neroli Patchouli Rose Absolute Rosemary 18-Cineole Sandalwood Australian and Vetiver like the product description says. I love to put this oil into a diffuser while I'm cleaning or just hanging around the house on a weekend and it's also great to diffuse during thunderstorms for my poor dog who's terrified of them.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: What can I say, this product is what it says it is. I love the relaxing nature of lavender essential oil, but lately I have been using it more for its skincare benefits and it has been helping out tremendously and helps to make the weight of world seem a little less through its calming and soothing scent.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: We used lavender petals for our send off instead of rice at our wedding and every time I smell its scent I'm taken back. I use lavender so often I had to buy the 30mL bottle this time! Not only does it smell amazing, but it has so many wonderful uses as well!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a must have oil at our house. Everyone suffers from seasonal allergies and lavender is one of the oils that we use to manage our allergies. Since using oils for allergies we rarely have to take any OTC allergy medicine. Lavender can be used for lots of things and smells good.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Wow what can I say. I love this product it is very high quality and as always nothing can be Plant Therapys service. I was burned during cooking with hot oil that splattered all over my forearm. After cleaning off the hot oil I applied lavender to my arm which was in quite alot of pain. Within minutes the pain drastically decreased and my skin began going from red back to being clear again. By an hour later the pain was just about completely gone and all that was left visible of the burn were two very small marks that didnt even hurt- no kidding. I am amazed and so very pleased with my Plant Therapy Lavender plus their always great customer service has made me a regular customer for the last couple of years. Thank you PT!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender eo has so many wonderful uses. I use it on my kids to ease restless legs growing pains and to help them relax before bed. It works wonders! My son has growing pains in his legs and I can mix coconut oil lavender and peppermint to quickly ease his pain and help him relax.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Whether you are a beginner or a certified aromatherapist- lavender is the most basic EO to own. It's versatile, safe, and the most researched (next to lemon!). PT lavender is fantastic quality. When diffusing it lasts for hours- the scent doesn't disappear like other brands I've tried. This means a little goes a long way. Great quality, excellent price 10/10 recommend!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
