review: I can never be without this delicate oil. It's always uplifting and beautiful. Its a favorite to diffuse at night for a restful sleep or to help you relax during the day. Very happy with my purchase - its not my first time and it certainly won't be my last!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is a staple EO in our house, the scent is amazing and just strong enough to not wear off within a couple hours. The quality is fantastic, I have used the oil for everything from diffusing, a rolll on, my laundry, and even in my bath/skincare products.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Staple Oil

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I bought this oil and Clary Sage for my pregnancy and labor and delivery. I had always smelled or heard of MLM company oils but when I got these I could not tell any difference!! Such a great price for high quality amazing essential oils!!! I use this one for Epsom salt baths, dryer balls, diffusing for sleep, basically everything! Lavender is amazing!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I figured this would be great for my mom. She's never used any essential oils, & she gets anxious about the Unfamiliar. Well she gets anxious about a lot of things. As a familiar smell & a skin-safe roll-on, it seemed like a safe choice for her. I tried it a few times first, & loved the scent - can't wait to get a bottle for myself! But just a few minutes after applying it, the scent is entirely gone. Nothing. My mom used it a few times & agreed. Since then all she's done is remove the cap & give it a few whiffs. She enjoys that also, but wishes there were a way to make it linger.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I had been using a lavender from another company and although it smelled fine, it wasn't until I used Plant Therapy that I realized how superior this company's lavender was to the other with regards to therapeutic benefits. The othe lavender never helped me relax but this one actually helped me fall asleep within minutes! All of my oils are from Plant Therapy now. Best quality, scent and the only company I trust!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love this lavender oil because it smells really good. I mix it with fragrance free lotion and use it every night to help me relax before bed and it also helps me to breathe better during allergy season. I always have this oil on hand. It is my favorite.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Is there really a reason to write a review for this product? This lavender roll on is a staple in my home! This product is, hands down, superb quality and it shows. I have used this for all sorts of burns, cuts, scrapes, bug bites, sensory issues, calming related issues, sleep issues, etc. I cannot think of one negative about this oil! Perhaps the only downside is that this roll on bottle isn't big enough! Some people will think that lavender is just lavender and it doesn't matter where it comes from because it's only lavender. I can honestly tell you that THIS lavender from Plant Therapy is a true gem. I am quite a snob when it comes to oils and I know when an oil is of high quality and when it is not. You can never go wrong with Plant Therapy, and you most certainly can never go wrong with this lavender roll on! I have also used this for stocking stuffers, teacher gifts, new parent gifts, and for the in-laws! Literally great for all friends and family!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender eo has a wonderful scent and calming effect. I put a drop on my service dogs collar before we leave the house, when my anxiety gets to be too much, I bend down to hug my dog, no one knows I'm actually smelling the lavender on his collar :relaxed:

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is the oil that I've used and reordered the most! I diffuse it with lemon regularly because it smells great. During cold/flu times at our home I diffuse it with a few drops of Oregano and Lemon or Oregano and Frankincense. I also mix it with lemon in olive oil and put on our skin to repel mosquitoes. I use a diluted drop for minor cuts and bug bites. The list goes on and on. After doing some research I found that Plant Therapy is one of the reputable and more trusted companies so I haven't really used any other Brands except the Now Brand.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This of course is one of the oils that many people use ALL the time. It's true of me as well. I use PT Lavender oil most days. This is an excellent lavender. I only give it 4 stars because It's not my favorite scent. I'm hoping to try the Lavender Fine to see if I like it better. However as far as the therapeutic uses It's just wonderful and worth every penny!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: What can't you use lavender for? It smells great in soaps lotions etc. It is soothing to sunburned skin. It makes your laundry smell fresh and clean without any phthalate laced fragrances. It creates the perfect environment for restful sleep when diffused.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This essential oil has helped my 2 year old with his eczema, worked within the first diluted application. We diffuse it for sleeping and it helps us keep rested. I love the smell and the medicinal benefits this has, as well as the fact this brand has kidsafe options!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender essential oil every day. I diffuse it in my daughters' room at night, I add a few drops to my free and clear laundry detergent and on my dryer balls. I make a pet safe carpet powder with lavender. It's such a versatile product and I like the large size so I don't have to buy it as often!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lovely lavender oil! I was amazed when I opened the bottle. I had been ordering oils from a MLM for a year thinking they were the best available. Plant therapy has impressed me I can save money and get a high quality oil. Love this oil the price and this company.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I use lavender for sooooo many things but particularly for diffusing to help me sleep and as a spray to ward off mosquitos. I live in central Florida and the mosquitos come at you in swarms. I have tried many other natural deterrents but lavender is the best! Mosquitos just stay away!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Love adding lavender to most of my diffuser blends. The smell is wonderful. The essential oil is a perfect addition to anyone beginning oil therapy. So many considerable uses and benefits too. Adding the plant in the yard is also great. It attracts bees and permeates the air with its sweet aroma.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender has always been my #1 fave! Out of all the different lavender oils I have tried..plant therapy is my favorite. I stumbled across plant therapy a few years back trying to find the perfect oil company. Lavender was my first purchase and after I fell in love with their lavender I was hooked! I will not buy from anywhere else now. I use plant Therapys lavender for pretty much everything from diffusing it to make my house spell good, calming, and to help me sleep.. to mixing it with coconut oil for my skin, for a perfume, and for my face (no breakouts for this mama!). Its always in my collection of oils.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Smells amazing so relaxing and so happy yall have premade roll ons! Since I have no money to make my own having the roll ons save me time and money! Looking forward to ordering more in the future and I hope you add to your kids safe and adult roll on line! :D

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender from plant therapy is strong and lasting. One drop truly goes a long way and that speaks to the purity of the product. Needless to say or something I use before I teach. It assists me in having a relaxed wonderful time creating art with children.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender oil is listed as a medium aroma and it's just right, not too strong or light. I use it in my room diffuser at night time to help me fall asleep. I've gotten used to the smell so I find myself adding more drops to really smell the lavender. Overall a soothing scent and works great in a diffuser.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender is one of the first oils that most people try, because it's familiar and safe. Then it remains a staple in your collection unless there's allergies or the rare person who simply dislikes it. PTs particular version is strong and FANTASTIC. Simply a great smell. Blends great in a diffuser or by itself, and is pretty much essential in cleaning products, skin blends, etc...it's one of the rare oils that can be used in just about anything you can imagine. On a personal note of use, I have three kids with special needs that often can use some calming down, and this is my go-to. Diffused pretty much every day, a drop on a pillow at bedtime, a roll-on for quick action...it definitely helps, the kids love it, and it's KidSafe so you can feel safe using it. And for the price for a large bottle, there's really no point in buying the smaller ones! If you haven't already tried Lavender, now is the time!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have been so excited to have discovered Plant Therapy! I have previously ordered a different, more expensive brand. I love that the cost is cheaper but the quality isn't! Lavender is my favorite oil and I would highly recommend purchasing it from Plant Therapy!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender eo has so many wonderful uses. I use it on my kids to ease restless legs growing pains and to help them relax before bed. It works wonders! My son has growing pains in his legs and I can mix coconut oil lavender and peppermint to quickly ease his pain and help him relax.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Lavender Oil has become one of my favorite oils. My husband was never into my oils....but he was ok with me using them. He was reading a sleep book and it was recommended that he use some Lavender Oil to help with good quality sleep. I made him his own roller bottle and he LOVES it! The purity of Plant Therapy's oils is such a relief to me knowing he is using it each night and loving it, it's good for him and helps him get good quality sleep!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am always hesitant to try new oil brands I figured lavendar would be a true test of scents. This has a crisp clean scent comparable to a more expensive brand at an affordable price with just as high potency. Why should you pay more so your upline profits?

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This lavender is very high quality. My favorite essential oil and very versatile. My favorite way to use this is in the bath or as pillow spray. It's a very relaxing oil and can be used many ways. Try it, you won't be disappointed. And the price is amazing!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I am new to the Plant Therapy family (previously used other brands) and just received my first order one of the oils being Lavender. Boy I am happy I ordered this one! Such a beautiful and pure aroma! Plant Therapy has high quality products for sure. Will definitely be ordering again.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I used to order oils through a provider. Once you learn they hike up the prices because they have to pay their sales people it makes sense why they are so expensive. Now that I have discovered plant therapy I will only purchase from them. It is the same quality if not better. I use this to diffuse as well as sleep. Put some on my palms and balls of my feet and it calms me down.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have always like lavender scent and this is a quality oil. I purchased along with 5 other oils from Plant Therapy to make a blend for sleeping . I am new to essential oils and although I love the scents and their benefits I have also learned that many are highly toxic to cats; I won't be making as many future purchases as I had hoped. I'll use personal inhalers and not diffusers for the safety of my pets.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I used to hate the lavender smell- i still kind of do as PT's lavender is so strong and potent, which makes you confident of its quality. But now, I ha e used this for so many things especially with my 2 babies that I have come to love/hate the smell intead of just hate it. :joy: Needless to say, I bought the 30 ml bottle after I used up my 1p ml. Thanks PT for quality at a great price!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I have to admit I am one that really did not care much for the smell of Lavender however this oil has become one of my favorite oils. It is so versatile...I use it in hair care skin care and diffuse it at night for a restful sleep and also use it in a spray to freshen up the bed. I was skeptical at first but it is a go to for having in my collection.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I had given about 30 drops to my friend to try in her diffuser to help her child with falling asleep at night. The Plant Therapy lavender worked wonders. After she ran out she went to the store and found a different brand. She found that brand didn't smell as good or strong. So to always try to encourage people to use quality essential oils (and not ones that are fragrance oils) I bought a bottle for her. And this is the only lavender that I've been using for at least 5 years because I too think it has a wonderful smell and I know it works wonders!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is my favourite oil! I love the smell and find it so relaxing. I purchased the 100ml bottle and found the dropper (just the normal dispenser that gives you drops) to be a bit defective but still functional and a non issue in my world. The oil seems to come out the side instead of the centre hole. My 4 year old son loves the smell of this as well. My 6 year old daughter not so much but she prefers fruity not floral. Will purchase again!

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I love lavender and hope one day to buy this in organic and fine and whatever other types there are. I love diffusing it and using it in an inhaler or roller. I love it plain. It has a specialness to it I can't explain. When blends have lavender, I usually buy it. You can't go wrong with PT lavender- great price and value on top of all the other benefits PT offers.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: I got this oil in an "essential oil set" that came at hand when I first started with essential oils. I can't say I love the scent, but the benefits of it are amazing. I keep on hearing it's good for allergies when used with lemon and peppermint, but never got the chance to actually try it because Saint God, I don't suffer from any allergies ...but it happened to find myself in too much dust and then my nose started to pour....and pour...and I applied peppermint, lemon and lavender on my nostrils, the back of my neck, and on the forehead and almost instantly the symptoms were gone. I couldn't believe, but wow, it works! So never mind the smell if it's doing the joB! It's also good for minor burns if applied undiluted.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: This is also a top oil you will want in your EO arsenal. The Plant Therapy lavender oil doesn't smell fake like other brands. Excellent quality! I use it to help put my little kiddos to sleep. Blends great with Roman chamomile for a sleepy time blend.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)
review: Who doesn't love lavender essential oil?! I call it the power flower because of all the uses in the home. Unfortunately many companies try to sell fake versions of lavender EO to unknowing customers especially targeting those just venturing into the essential oil world. Plant Therapy's lavender essential oil is the real deal! Compare this to other brands found at health stores with a sniff test and you'll smell the difference. I'm thankful for this company's commitment to selling high quality oils at affordable prices.

Product Name: Plant Therapy Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure, Undiluted, Therapeutic Grade, Aromatherapy Diffuser for Relaxation and Body Care, Healthy Skin and Hair, 10 mL (1/3 oz)

The purity of Plant Therapy's oils is such a relief to me knowing he is using it each night and loving it, it's good for him and helps him get good quality sleep!

review: I've been using Plant Therapy Lavender essential oil for many years now, it's a must have for any house hold, I diffuse it, I use it on cuts and scrapes for my kids, I use it for PMS issues, it's great to help with anxiety and very relaxing to diffuse at bedtime.
